SA15n2992:0: Viśālāmalavatī pramāṇasamuccayaṭīkā Chapter 2 dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣamanumānaṁ cetyuktam |
SA15n2992:2: samprati prāptāvasaramanumānaṁ vyutpādayitumāha- anumānaṁ dvidhetyā- di |
SA15n2992:6: gamakalakṣaṇavidhānenaiva hi pratipipādayiṣorvacanānukramo darśita eva anyathābhidhāne gamakadha- rmādyotanāt |
SA15n2992:7: na hi ye yathā yamarthaṁ vidanti vacanajñāḥ te tatprati- pādane punarupadeśāntaramapekṣante ||
SA15n2992:10: yathāvastu pratipādyamānā api hyanyathā nigadanto dṛṣṭāḥ upayogino'pyavi- nābhāvasyāvacanādanupayogināmapi ca sādhyopanayanigamanānāṁ prayo- gāt ||
SA15n2992:11: trirūpāditi hetau pañcamī abhighātāc chabda iti yathā |
SA15n2992:12: atha va lyablope yathā prāsādamāruhya prekṣate prāsādāt prekṣate |
SA15n2992:13: tathā trirūpaṁ liṅgaṁ dṛṣṭvārthadarśanam- trirūpāl liṅgato'rthadṛgiti ||
SA15n2992:15: kiṁ ca lī- no'rtho liṅgyate'neneti liṅgam |
SA15n2992:16: tac ca trairūpyaṁ vinā na sambhavati |
SA15n2992:28: avinābhāvitvaṁ hi sā- dhyād bahiriṣyate anyathānupapannatvaṁ tu dharmiṇyeva sādhya eveti |
SA15n2992:34: trairūpyamātre hi sa deśāntaragataḥ śyāmaḥ caitraputra- tvādityasyāpi hetutvaṁ syād iti ||
SA15n2992:35: tatra yaduktam- avinābhāvitvaṁ hi paraiḥ sādhyādbahiriṣyata iti eṣo'dhyāropaḥ |
SA15n2992:36: sarvopasaṁhāreṇa hi yatra yatra sādhanadharmaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharma ityaṣā vyāptiravinābhāvitvam |
SA15n2992:38: yadi ca sādhyadharmiṇyeva yaḥ sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī sa heturi- ṣyate evaṁ sati yasya bahirapi sādhyenāvinābhāvas tasya hetutvaṁ na syāt |
SA15n2992:39: vyabhicāryapi ca hetuḥ syāt tasyāpi dharmiṇyanyathānupapanna- tvasya sambhavāt |
SA15n2992:41: ata evāsyāyuktatvān na catu- rlakṣaṇo heturupapadyate ||
SA15n2992:42: yat punaruktam- trairūpyamātre hi sa syāmaḥ caitraputratvāditya- syāpi hetutvaṁ syāditi tadayuktam |
SA15n2992:47: anyas tu dvirūpo heturiti darśayannāha- ajñāto dharmiṇo dharmo dharme sanneva yatra hi |
SA15n2992:50: ajñāto dharmo jijñāsito'nityatvādir dharmiṇaḥ śabdāderyatra jñāyate kṛtakatvādau dharme |
SA15n2992:52: sanneveti pramātrā ghaṭādiṣu svayaṁ smaryate paro va smāryate parārthānumāne |
SA15n2992:53: sanneva nāsa- nnityetau vidhiniṣedhau yasya staḥ sa vidhiniṣedhavānhetuḥ |
SA15n2992:55: atra sādhyadharmo yatra sanneva nāsanniti bruvatā tadevānvayavyatire- kavattvamuktaṁ bhavati yasmādevaṁ sa tatra sanneva bhavati yadi tadabhāve heturna bhavatyeva |
SA15n2992:56: tataś ca trairupyamevākārāntareṇoktamiti na dvirūpo hetuḥ ||
SA15n2992:58: trīṇi caitāni- abādhitaviṣayatvaṁ viva- kṣitaikasaṅkhyatvaṁ jñātatvaṁ ceti |
SA15n2992:59: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṁ tāvan na rūpānta- ram bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodhāt |
SA15n2992:60: avinābhāvo hi hetoḥ sādhyadharme satyeva bhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:61: kathaṁ ca sa tallakṣaṇo dharmiṇi hetuḥ syāt na cātra sādhyadharmo bhavet |
SA15n2992:64: vyavacchedyābhāvād vivakṣitaikasaṅkhyatvamapi na lakṣaṇāntaratvena vā- cyam |
SA15n2992:66: sva- lakṣaṇayuktayoś ca hetvorekatra virodhinorupanipāte viruddhāvyabhi- cāritvaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:67: na ca yathoktalakṣaṇānāṁ kāryasvabhāvānupalambhānāṁ pratyanīko hetuḥ sambhavati |
SA15n2992:68: kathaṁ hi nāma ekaḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhāvāt tenāvyabhicārī tatraiva cānyo'pi tadbādhakasya bhāva eva bhāvād viruddhas tena sambhavet |
SA15n2992:69: api ca sa heturyadi svabhāvata eva taddharmabhāvī tadārthāntaropanipāte'pi kathamanyathā syāt |
SA15n2992:70: na hi (5) vastūnāṁ svabhāvānyathābhāvasya viruddhasvabhāvadvayasya ca sambhavaḥ |
SA15n2992:71: atha svabhāvato'taddharmabhāvī evaṁ satyanyadāpi na sādhanaṁ kasyacit |
SA15n2992:72: tasmāt svabhāvata eva svasādhyāvinābhāvino yathoktalakṣaṇasya hetos tallakṣaṇaḥ pratiheturna sambhavatītyalakṣaṇamekasaṅkhyāvivakṣā |
SA15n2992:73: viruddhāvyabhicāryavacanaprasaṅga iti cet vastubalapravṛttaṁ liṅgaṁ pratīṣṭa- tvādadoṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:77: kiṁrūpāl liṅgādarthaḥ pratipattavya iti cintāyāṁ pratipatturavisaṁvādakasya rūpamu- cyate yaddarśanādayaṁ sādhanāsādhane pravivecya tasyeṣṭārthasādhanapratyayāt pravartate |
SA15n2992:78: tatra yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpam tal lakṣaṇam na pararūpa- m pratipattijanmanyupayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve'tiprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:82: tasmāj jñānamapi na liṅgalakṣaṇameṣṭavyamiti sthitame- tat- trirūpa eva heturiti ||
SA15n2992:84: yathā pratyakṣe dvidhā phalamuktaṁ viṣayasaṁvittiḥ svasaṁvittiś ca tathehāpi pratyakṣavadavyatiriktamanumānasyādhigamā- tmakaṁ phalamiti bruvatānumānamapyadhigamasvabhāvamityuktaṁ bhavati ||
SA15n2992:87: tuśabdo'vadhāraṇārthaḥ- etadeva dvayamatulyam adhiga- marūpatā tu tulyeti |
SA15n2992:89: tac cedabhinnam tat kimanyadrūpam yaducyate- rūpaṁ cātulyametayoriti |
SA15n2992:91: tathā hi- tat pratyakṣasya spaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṁ tvanumānasya ||
SA15n2992:93: viṣayaśabdenātrālambanaṁ vivakṣitam na tu prā- māṇyasya viṣayaḥ |
SA15n2992:98: na hi tāvekasya vilakṣaṇā- vākārau yujyete |
SA15n2992:99: bhinna iti cābhinnapratiṣedha eva draṣṭavyaḥ na tu nā- (7)
SA15n2992:101: tac ca anumāna- sya sammato yo viṣayaḥ tasya tattvato'pariniṣpannatvāt ||
SA15n2992:104: tasyākāraḥ svabhāvaḥ ākriyate paricchidyata iti kṛtvā |
SA15n2992:107: na tu nānāsvabhāvatānena pratipadyate sāmānyasya vikalpitatvenāsattvāt |
SA15n2992:108: tadetat sūcitaṁ bhavati- yasmāt pratyakṣasya bahirviṣayo'sti yatas tasya spaṣṭo viṣayapratibhāso bhavati na tvanumānasya yas tu tasyāsphuṭo viṣayākāraḥ sa sva- bījabalādeva jāyate tasmāt pratyakṣānumānayoryathoktaṁ svarūpaṁ bhinna- miti |
SA15n2992:109: atha vā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṁ sākṣāt spaṣṭasvākārajanakaṁ prameyaṁ svarūpeṇa anumānasya tu tadeva pāramparyeṇāsphuṭaviṣayā- kārajanakaṁ pararūpeṇa prameyam |
SA15n2992:111: tadevaṁ yataḥ pratyakṣānumānayorbhinno viṣayaḥ atas tatsvabhāvaviśeṣāt spaṣṭāspaṣṭaviṣayākāratayā svarūpamapi bhinnamiti ||
SA15n2992:113: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ svārthaparārthabhedenānumānameva dvidhā bhidyate na tu pratyakṣamityavadhāraṇena darśayati |
SA15n2992:114: etaduktaṁ bhavati- svayaṁ pratyakṣīkṛtasyārthasya parāvabodhanāya yad vacanam tat parārthaṁ pratyakṣaṁ dvitīyaṁ kasmān neṣyata iti ||
SA15n2992:117: tatra ca yādṛ- śamanumānamātmanaḥ tādṛśameva parasantāne vācā kriyata iti yuktaṁ tasya dvaividhyam |
SA15n2992:119: na ca tatra yādṛśa- mātmanaḥ pratyakṣajñānam tādṛk śabdena santānāntare janayituṁ śa- kyate tasyānirdeśyatvāt |
SA15n2992:120: anyathāndhādīnāmapi śabdāt tathāvigha- meva sphuṭapratibhāsi jñānaṁ syāt |
SA15n2992:123: na ca tac chakyate nirdeṣṭum tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt |
SA15n2992:125: tasmāt tasyaiva grāhyaṁ nirdeśyam na pratyakṣasya ||
SA15n2992:131: tato nānumānavat pratyakṣasya viṣayo nirdeśya iti ||
SA15n2992:132: anye tvāhuḥ - vṛttabhaṅgabhayādatra yat paścād vaktavyam tat pūrvamu- ktam |
SA15n2992:133: tasmādevamatha grantho vijñeyaḥ- kasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhi- dyate na pratyakṣamiti pṛṣṭe kāraṇamāha- grāhyabhedādityādi |
SA15n2992:134: yadi grāhyabhedādanumānaṁ dvighā bhidyate evaṁ sati pratyakṣamapi dvidhā bhidye- tetyāha- svalakṣaṇamanirdeśyamiti |
SA15n2992:135: etaduktaṁ bhavati- īdṛśamidaṁ pratyakṣānumānayorgrāhyamiṣyate yatraikaṁ nirdeśyamanyadanirdeśyamiti |
SA15n2992:136: tasmādanumānameva dvidhā bhidyate yasya viṣayo vācā parasmai pratipā- dayituṁ śakyate na tu pratyakṣamiti ||
SA15n2992:137: nanu cārthas tu rūpaṁ cātulyametayorityanena prāgeva pramāṇayorviṣa- yabhedaḥ pratipāditas tadbhedāc ca svarūpabhedaḥ |
SA15n2992:138: tat kimidamupanya- stam- bhinnaṁ hi pratyakṣānumānayoḥ svātmavad grāhyamityādi |
SA15n2992:141: sa tenaiva śabdenānumeyaḥ syāditi sa eva pratyakṣagrāhyo'rthas tataḥ śabdāt (10)
SA15n2992:145: paras tu jāḍyādimaṁ doṣamanavagacchan svayamabhyupagata- pramāṇaikaviṣayatvasya dṛṣṭānuvidhāyitāṁ darśayanniṣṭamevaṁ me taditi nanu cetyādinā sūcayati |
SA15n2992:147: sa eva ca rūpeṇānu- mīyata iti manyate |
SA15n2992:148: kadāciditi yadā sparśa indriyeṇa na spṛśyate tadetyarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:150: pratyakṣaṁ hi bhedāntaravimarśavi- vekena pratiṣṭhitenaiva rūpeṇa sparśaṁ paricchinatti anumānaṁ tu smārtā- kṛṣṭapūrvānusandhānataḥ- so'yaṁ mayā pūrvamanena rūpeṇa saha prāgupala- bdha iti sparśasāmānyamasparśavyāvṛttam |
SA15n2992:152: yathā rūpaṁ na pratyakṣato gṛhyata ityeva svalakṣaṇā- kāreṇa liṅgaṁ bhavati viśeṣasyānanvayāt api tu sāmānyākāreṇaiva pūrvadṛṣṭānusaṁhitena tathā na sparśaḥ pūrvapratyakṣeṇa gṛhīta ityeva svala- kṣaṇato'numeyaḥ kiṁ tu sāmānyākāreṇaivānumānayogyeneti darśayati ||
SA15n2992:154: yadi yathānubhūtamācakṣate evaṁvyava- hārā āryā yujyante |
SA15n2992:155: tvanmatena tu svalakṣaṇamupalabhyānyadeva kathayatāṁ vyavahārā anāryāḥ syuḥ |
SA15n2992:158: te ca sati svasminnimitte āryaiḥ prayujyante nāsatītyāryā vyavahārā abhyupeyante na tu svalakṣaṇābhidhānāditi nābhyupetabādhe- ti ||
SA15n2992:161: nanu ca naiva cakṣurvijñānā- nubhūta eva kṣaṇo manovijñānenānubhūyate |
SA15n2992:167: tulyajā- tīyatvāc ca pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorabhedavivakṣayaivamabhihitaṁ syāt |
SA15n2992:169: tataś ca cakṣurvi- jñānena sahotpannamevārthaṁ vijānātītyayamatrārtha ityadoṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:170: yadi yat (12) tanmanovijñānānubhūtaṁ svalakṣaṇam tadanirdeśyam kathaṁ mano nīlaṁ ca vijānāti nīlamiti cāviṣṭābhilāpaṁ tadeva |
SA15n2992:176: tac ca vijānāti na kevalaṁ svalakṣaṇam |
SA15n2992:182: tathā hi- yadyākārāntareṇa mano nirdiśati na tarhi tena cakṣurvijñānānubhūtameva nirdiṣṭaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:183: atha tadeva svalakṣaṇaṁ nirdiśati na nāmākārāntare- ṇeti ||
SA15n2992:191: lānanavadagrahaṇāt sparśamātraṁ vāyuriti pareṇākte tatparihārāyāha- adṛṣṭasyāpi liṅgataḥ samadhigamaṁ kariṣyāmaḥ |
SA15n2992:194: na ca dṛṣṭānāṁ sparśa ityadṛṣṭa- liṅgo vāyuriti |
SA15n2992:197: nirvṛkṣakṣupe deśe śukaśukāśabdaḥ samupalabhyate tṛṇādināṁ ca dhṛtiḥ |
SA15n2992:198: teṣāṁ dravyāntareṇāsati pratibandhe gurutvāt pātaḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:205: na cāsau pūrvaṁ dṛṣṭaḥ tatprathamataḥ sparśavi- śeṣeṇa grahaṇādityasāmānyaviṣayamanumānam ||
SA15n2992:207: tacchabdena sparśa eva sambadhyate na tu vāyuḥ ||
SA15n2992:208: (14) ata evāha- na hi tad vāyvādiṣvityādi |
SA15n2992:213: atha vā tacchabdena vāyureva sambadhyata iti darśayannāha- na vā vāyvādisvabhāveṣvityādi |
SA15n2992:214: asyārthaḥ- yo guṇaḥ sa dravyāśritaḥ gandhavat |
SA15n2992:216: sparśasya guṇatvād dravyā- śritatve'numite dravyatvamātramarthataḥ sidhyati |
SA15n2992:217: tad yathā cakṣurādīnāṁ pārārthye siddhe paro'pyarthataḥ sidhyatītyabhiprāyaḥ ||
SA15n2992:224: teṣāṁ hi sparśavattvād ghaṭādīnāṁ tatra pratighātaḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:229: tasmāt pariśeṣād vāyorevāyaṁ sparśa ityeṣā pariśeṣasiddhiḥ ||
SA15n2992:232: yasmād- nyeṣāṁ yasyāsambhavaḥ tatra siddhasattāke tasyāstitvaṁ sambhāvyate |
SA15n2992:233: yasya tu sattvamevāsiddham kathaṁ tatra pariśeṣāt so'stīti sambhā- vyate |
SA15n2992:234: na hi- yadānyena tatra sannihitena puruṣeṇedaṁ kāryaṁ na kṛtamiti sambhāvyate tadā vandhyāsutena pariśeṣāt kṛtametaditi yuktaṁ sambhā- vayitum |
SA15n2992:235: teṣveva tu kenedaṁ kṛtamiti saṁśayo bhavati ||
SA15n2992:237: siddhe'pi tasya sattve pratiṣedhasya tu- lyatvān na yuktamanumānam |
SA15n2992:238: yathaivāyaṁ sparśaḥ pṛthivyādiṣu na dṛṣṭacara iti teṣāṁ na bhavati tathā vāyāvapi prāṅna dṛṣṭa iti tasyāpi mā bhūt |
SA15n2992:239: kathaṁ tarhi vāyoḥ pariśeṣasiddhirityāha- siddhe hītyādi |
SA15n2992:240: yathotpa- ttimatāṁ ghaṭādīnāṁ sattvaṁ siddham tathā yadi vāyvādīnāṁ jijñāsitā- nāṁ sattvaṁ siddhaṁ bhavati evaṁ sati hetoḥ siddhatvaṁ labhyate nānyathā |
SA15n2992:242: siddhe'pi teṣāṁ sattve yadi sa dharmaḥ pramāṇena bādhyate'gnāviva śaityam evamapyasiddha eva hetuḥ syāt viparyayāt tu siddha ityevaṁ yathā hetoḥ siddhatvaṁ janyate tathā darśitam |
SA15n2992:248: guṇaviśeṣeṇeti yathoktena sādhyadharmiṇi si- ddhasattākenānvayavyatirekavatā dharmeṇa |
SA15n2992:249: dravyaviśeṣānumānaṁ kriyata iti pariśeṣād vāyuranumīyata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:250: tatrāpi sāmānyākāreṇeti veditavyam na tu svarūpeṇa yasmāt prāgevānumānasya svalakṣaṇavi- ṣayatvaṁ niṣiddham |
SA15n2992:252: tatrāyaṁ prayogaḥ- yo yataḥ siddhasattākādanyeṣāṁ na sambhāvyate vastudharmas tatra ca pramāṇenābādhitaḥ sa tasya bhavati |
SA15n2992:253: tad yathotpattimadbhyaḥ siddhasattākebhyo'nyeṣāmasambhāvyamānamanityatvaṁ vastudharmas tatra pra- māṇenābādhitaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:254: vāyoḥ siddhasattākādanyeṣāṁ na sambhāvya- te'nuṣṇāśītasparśo vastudharmas tatra ca pramāṇenābādhita iti sva- bhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:255: evaṁ sparśasya pariśeṣād vāyusambandhitve siddhe vāyuḥ kvacid deśaviśeṣe kālaviśeṣe vā sidhyati |
SA15n2992:256: tvanmatena tveṣāṁ pariśeṣasiddhirna bhavatīti darśayannāha- sattvaṁ tvasiddhamityādi |
SA15n2992:257: yasmāt sattvama- siddhaṁ tulyaś ca pṛthivyādibhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tasmādguṇaviśeṣābhā- vaḥ trairūpyavato dharmasyābhāva ityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:261: evaṁ tāvad dṛṣṭādṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhamabhyupetyānu- mānābhāva uktaḥ ||
SA15n2992:262: samprati pratiṣedha evāyukta iti darśayannāha- yadyadarśanamātre- ṇetyādi |
SA15n2992:263: mātragrahaṇenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yadadarśanam tata evābhāvaḥ sidhyatīti sūcayati |
SA15n2992:267: tatra ca tūlopalapa- llavādiṣu tadbhāve'pi sparśabhedadarśanāt kvacid viśeṣasyāpi sambhavāc chaṅkayā bhāvyamiti sarvatrādarśanamātreṇāyuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ||
SA15n2992:268: adṛṣṭebhyo'pi na yukta iti darśannāha- na hyadṛṣṭebhya ityādi |
SA15n2992:271: abhighātasya vāyaṁ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadviparītasya vā vastuno vidhiḥ |
SA15n2992:272: yadi pratiṣedhaḥ abhighātasparśaviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vyāpya- vyāpakabhāvo vā vācyaḥ yato hetuvyāpakāveva nivartamānau svaprati- baddhe kāryavyāpye nivartayataḥ anyathātiprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:273: kāryakāraṇavyā- pyavyāpakabhāvau ca na sidhyataḥ vināpyabhighātena sparśaviśeṣasya bhāvādarthāntaratvāc ca |
SA15n2992:275: ghātākhyaṁ vastvevocyate paryudāsavṛttyā tasya tarhi vyomādhibhiḥ sambandhaḥ sādhyaḥ sparśaviśeṣeṇa ca virodhaḥ |
SA15n2992:276: anyathā kathaṁ tadasa- mbaddhamaviruddhaṁ ca tenaitat tatra bādhata atiprasanṅgo vā ||
SA15n2992:278: tathā hi- teṣu tasya vṛttirvā sambandhaḥ syāt tajjanyatā vā |
SA15n2992:279: na tāvad vṛttiḥ sidhyati teṣāmatī- ndriyatvāt |
SA15n2992:281: na ca vino- palambhenātredaṁ vartata iti śakyate niścetum |
SA15n2992:283: na hyanvayamātrāt kāraṇasya sāmarthyaṁ gamyate api tu vyatirekādapi |
SA15n2992:284: sa ceha nāsti nityatvāt sarvagata- tvāc ca vyomādināṁ tadabhāve tadabhāvāsambhavāt |
SA15n2992:292: manasi ca guṇopajani- tavyatirekanibandhanā ṣaṣṭhī nānumeyāpekṣā |
SA15n2992:294: guṇasya guṇāpekṣāyā nityatvāt sāmarthyābhāvado- ṣo'pi nāsti |
SA15n2992:297: vibhutvaṁ nāma guṇo'numeyaḥ atha ca sukhādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ tathā mana- so'pyaṇutvamekatvaṁ cānumeyametadguṇadvayaṁ syāt ayaṁ ca sparśaḥ pratyakṣo guṇaḥ syāditi na kaścid virodhaḥ ||
SA15n2992:298: idānīṁ yadatra yuktam tat pratipādayitumāha- kiṁ tarhītyādi |
SA15n2992:300: kathaṁ punar- dṛṣṭeṣu ca dṛṣṭatvādityetaduktam yāvatā sa sparśaviśeṣo dṛṣṭeṣvapi naiva dṛṣṭaḥ ||
SA15n2992:304: yo yatra dṛṣṭasāmānyaḥ sa tatra sambhavati |
SA15n2992:307: atha vā yo yatra dṛṣṭaḥ sa tatra sambhavadviśeṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:312: yadyevaṁ niścayena bhavitavyam- atrai- vāyaṁ sambhavatīti |
SA15n2992:314: tasmānnāyaṁ dṛṣṭeṣu sambhavatī- tyata āha- teṣāṁ cetyādi |
SA15n2992:315: anekatvāt saṁśayaḥ na tu tatrāsambha- vādityarthaḥ ||
SA15n2992:316: tairapi vāyorānumānikatvaṁ nirastamiti darśayannāha- āptasañjñā- vidhānenetyādi |
SA15n2992:320: dravyam yadayamāśrita iti dravyamātrānumānam tat parityajya |
SA15n2992:322: yasmāt kṣīṇadoṣairnavaiva dravyasañjñā vihitāḥ tatra pṛthivyādiṣvaṣṭāsu dravyeṣvaṣṭau sañjñā niveśitāḥ vāyusañjñaivāvaśiṣyate na cānyad dravyamasti daśamam tasmād yasyāyaṁ sparśaḥ sa vāyurityevaṁ pṛthivyādibhyo'nyasya daśamāder dra- vyasya pṛthivyādeś cānyasya pratiṣedhena vāyusattvamavagacchati ||
SA15n2992:324: śābdasya pramāṇāntaratvanirākara- ṇāya pramāṇāntaravādī tāvaduttaraṁ dāyikaḥ svayaṁ tūttaratra dāsyati |
SA15n2992:326: sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve śrotuḥ siddhe iti dṛṣṭā- ntānabhidhānam |
SA15n2992:328: tadetaduktaṁ bhavati- yadanupadiṣṭāvayavam tadanumānād bhinnam pratyakṣavat |
SA15n2992:333: śeṣāvayavāpe- kṣayā dṛṣṭāntasyaikatvam na tu dṛṣṭāntāpekṣayā |
SA15n2992:336: vāśabdaś cārthe vartamāno- 'nuktasamuccayaṁ karoti trayāṇāṁ caturṇāṁ pañcānāṁ cetyarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:337: tena (21) yadāpi sādhāraṇaṁ hetuṁ karoti tadāpi svārthānumānenānekānto bhavati |
SA15n2992:339: parasya śābdamanumānād bhinnaṁ pratītam tena śābdavat prasaṅgaḥ anumānād bhinnatvaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:340: yathābhūtaṁ śābdam tathābhūtaṁ tadapi prāpnotīti yāvat |
SA15n2992:341: vināpi hi vatinā tadartho gamyata ityuktaprāyam ||
SA15n2992:343: śabdo hi svarūpeṇābhinnarūpamevārthaṁ pratyāyayati na tvevaṁ dhūmādayaḥ |
SA15n2992:344: na hi dhūmādagniṁ pratiyan pratyāyaya- nvā dhūmarūpeṇa pratyeti pratyāyayati vā |
SA15n2992:347: tatra kiṁ svarūpeṇa so'rtho gamyata uta sāmā- nyarūpeṇa |
SA15n2992:349: tathā hi- yadi vṛkṣādayaḥ śabdāḥ sattvādibhiḥ sāmānyākārairvṛkṣādikamarthaṁ pratipādayeyuḥ sarvaśabdānāmekārthatā prasajyeta sāmānyākārāṇāmanekārthasādhā- raṇatvāt |
SA15n2992:350: atha viśeṣarūpeṇa tadayuktam asādhāraṇasya rūpasya pratipādayitumaśakyatvāditi sarvathā śabdārthatvābhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:354: etāvāṁs tu viśeṣaḥ - mayā tac chabdākāropa- raktaṁ pratīyata ityabhyupagatamiti darśayati |
SA15n2992:357: etaduktaṁ bhavati- arthāntaravyāvṛttyupalakṣito yo vastuno bhāgaḥ sa eva vṛkṣaśabdasyārtha iti tenaiva tasya sārūpyāt |
SA15n2992:358: na tu sattvādibhiḥ sādhāraṇairākārairasādhāraṇena vā rūpeṇeti manyate ||
SA15n2992:360: vṛkṣaśa- bdārtho yaḥ sa śabdāntarasyārtho na bhavati |
SA15n2992:362: atrāpi vṛkṣaśabdārthasya śabdāntarānabhidhe- yatāṁ darśayatā śabdāntarārthavyāvṛttyupalakṣitaṁ vṛkṣatvamātraṁ vṛkṣaśabda- syārtha ityuktaṁ bhavatīti sa evārthaḥ ||
SA15n2992:365: tataś cāsārupye'pyabhidheyatvadarśanān na śabdasārūpyeṇā- rthapratyāyanamityata āha- yadyapītyādi |
SA15n2992:370: tat (23) punā rūpāntaramadravyanivṛttyopalakṣyata iti darśayitumidamuktam- adravyanivṛttyeti ||
SA15n2992:372: na kevalaṁ dravyaśabdenādravyanivṛttyupalakṣitaṁ vastuno rūpāntaraṁ dravyaśabdasārupyaprāptiyogyaṁ gamyate api tu vṛkṣaśabde- nāpi |
SA15n2992:373: tathā hi- sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ dṛśyate- dravyaṁ vṛkṣa iti |
SA15n2992:375: na ca tena saha tasya sārūpyamiṣyate |
SA15n2992:376: tataḥ sa eva doṣaḥ asārūpye'pi śabdārthatvadarśanāt |
SA15n2992:380: mūḍhas tu śabdādeva gamyata iti manyate |
SA15n2992:381: sāmā- nādhikaraṇyaṁ tu viśeṣasahitasya viśeṣe vartamānatvāt |
SA15n2992:384: suba- ntānyeva padāni yadi śabdanibandhane pramāṇa ucyeran na syād doṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:385: tathā hi- teṣāṁ pariniṣpannarūpo'rtha idaṁ taditi pratyavamarśa- yogyo buddhau sanniviśata iti tena sahābhedopacāraḥ sambhavati śabdasya |
SA15n2992:389: ākhyā- taśabdaiḥ pacati paṭhatītyevamādibhiraliṅgāsaṅkhyā pūrvāparībhūtāvayavā pariniṣpannasvarūpā kriyocyate |
SA15n2992:390: na ca tathāvidhasyārthasyedaṁ tadityagṛ- hītasya buddyā śakyo'bhedopacāraḥ kartum |
SA15n2992:394: yadi vākya- meva śabdaḥ padānāmupādānaṁ kimarthamityāha- tadadhigamopāyaś cetyādi |
SA15n2992:397: vākyārtho hi bāhyo vā syāt sādhyasādhanasamba- ndhātmā sādhanaśaktiniveśāanugṛhītā niravayavā kriyā vā ānta- ro va pratibhālakṣaṇaḥ ||
SA15n2992:399: na ca tathābhūtenārthena so'yamityabhedopacāraḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti ||
SA15n2992:402: (25) yadi tarhi na bhidyate tvayā cāgamikatvaṁ vāyvādīnāṁ pratipādayatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṁ śābdasya pratipāditam evaṁ satyāgamānumānayo- rabhedāt siddhiṁ svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvamityāha- tatra śabdavinirmuktami- tyādi |
SA15n2992:404: etaduktaṁ bhavati- bha- vatāṁ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṁ śāstramityabhyupagamaḥ |
SA15n2992:406: na ca dṛṣṭānāṁ sparśa ityādinopanyastam etad yuṣma- cchāstrādeva nimittādasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamuktam |
SA15n2992:407: āgamikatvaṁ bhavatāmeva prasiddhaṁ bruvatā na tu svaprasiddhimiti kiṁ sandhāyaivamuktamityāha- śa- bdaminirmuktaṁ liṅgamabhisandhāyeti |
SA15n2992:409: tannirapekṣa eva sa yasmād vāyoḥ sattāṁ sādhayati |
SA15n2992:410: tadevaṁ tvadabhyupagataśāstravaśādakiñcitkaraṁ liṅgamabhipretya tajjamanumānaṁ mayedamasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamuktam na punaḥ svayamāgami- katvaṁ vāyvādīnāmicchatetyacodyam |
SA15n2992:411: evaṁ tarhi śābdamapi yathā svala- kṣaṇaviṣayaṁ na bhavati pratipādyatāmityataḥ pratipādayitumāha- śābda- mapi tvityādi |
SA15n2992:414: bhijño hi saṅketakālānubhūtārthasāmānyameva pratipadyate śabdāt na svalakṣaṇam tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt |
SA15n2992:416: saṅketakāle tu pratyakṣaṁ svalakṣaṇamiti sambhavati tadviṣa- yatvāśaṅkā |
SA15n2992:418: dṛṣṭārthaṁ yatrārthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate adṛṣṭārthaṁ viparyayāt |
SA15n2992:420: yathāyaṁ panasa ityatra sambandhavyutpattireva bhavati nānumānam arthasya pratyakṣatvāt |
SA15n2992:422: na hi svargādiśabdāḥ svargādīnāṁ saṅketakāle'nya- dā vā svalakṣaṇaṁ buddhāvarpayanti anatīndriyatvaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:423: kevalaṁ tatpratipādanābhiprāyaiḥ prayuktāḥ śrotaryapratibhāsamānatatsvabhāvamartha- bimbamarpayantyasti kaścit surādhivāsaviśeṣa ityevamādikam |
SA15n2992:424: na caivaṁ svalakṣaṇaṁ pratipannaṁ bhavati pratipāditaṁ vā svargādiśravaṇe tada- nubhāvināmiva pratibhāsabhedaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:425: apratipadyamāno'pi ca tatsva- bhāvaṁ tathābhūta eva vikalpapratibimbe tadadhyavasāyī santuṣyati (27)
SA15n2992:429: tatra hi dṛṣṭatvād viśeṣasya tasyaiva vācyatāśaṅkyeta |
SA15n2992:432: api nāmāgamāt puruṣopayo- ginamarthamatīndriyaṁ niścitya yathārhamanutiṣṭhannāsādayeyamityāgamo mṛgyate |
SA15n2992:433: tataś cedarthavikalpamātraṁ bhavati na viśiṣṭārthapratītiḥ tasyānumānatvameva hīyata ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA15n2992:434: nanu ca yathānāptaprayuktānāṁ śabdānāṁ vivakṣālakṣaṇaṁ yadarthamātraṁ tadvacanādevānumānatvam na tu bā- hyasyārthasyābhidhānāt tathāptaprayuktānāmapi syādityata āha- na hītyādi |
SA15n2992:435: evaṁ manyate- nāptavacaso vivakṣāmātre prāmāṇyameṣṭavyam api tu bāhye'pyarthe |
SA15n2992:445: nanu ca śabdānāmartheṣvapratibandhāt puruṣātiśayasya na niścetuma- śakyatvādbāhye'rthe prāmāṇyamevāyuktam |
SA15n2992:447: ayaṁ punaratrābhi- prāyaḥ- nāyaṁ puruṣo'nāśrityāgamaprāmāṇyamāsituṁ śaktaḥ atyakṣa- phalānāṁ keṣāñcinmahānuśaṁsāpāyaśravaṇāt tadbhāve virodhādarśanāc ca |
SA15n2992:450: tatra puruṣārthasya śakyasya ca tadupāyasya yat pratipā- danasamartham tac chāstraṁ parīkṣārhamiti tadeva parīkṣyeta anyatrāva- dhānasyaivāyuktatvāt |
SA15n2992:451: tad yadi na visaṁvādabhāgbhavati pravartamānaḥ śobheta ||
SA15n2992:459: tatsāmānyamanumīyate pratyakṣā- numānāgamye'pyartha āptavacanatvamupalabhya- yadāptavacanam tadavisaṁ- vādi tadanyāptavacanavat |
SA15n2992:462: tataś ca svalakṣaṇamaviṣayīkurvatāmapyāgamānāṁ na tadanyaśabdavad vivakṣāmātre prāmāṇyam |
SA15n2992:464: atha vānyathāptavacanasyāvisaṁvādād anumānatvamucyate- heyo- pādeyatadupāyānāṁ tadupadiṣṭānāmavaiparītyamavisaṁvādaḥ |
SA15n2992:465: tathāsya puru- ṣārthopayogino'nuṣṭhānārhasyāvisaṁvādād viṣayāntare'pi tathātvopaga- mo na vipralambhāya anuparodhān niṣprayojanavitathābhidhānavaiphalyāc ca vaktuḥ ||
SA15n2992:469: anumite tasmin paścāt tata evāvisaṁvādādāptavacaso'numānatvaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:470: anumānaśa- bdaś cātra liṅge vartate anumīyate'neneti kṛtvānumitikāraṇatvād vā |
SA15n2992:472: tat punaḥ pratipattura- bhiprāyānurodhāt na tu vastuvaśāt ||
SA15n2992:474: āptāḥ pratyakṣataḥ svargādīnāṁ svabhāvaṁ gṛhītvā sañjñāṁ praṇayanti |
SA15n2992:481: pradhānādibhiradṛṣṭasambandhatvāt talliṅgānāmāga- mikā eva pradhānādaya iti pūrvānusāreṇa vācyam ||
SA15n2992:485: yathā kākād dadhi rakṣyatāmityatra kākaḥ sarvasya śvāderupaghātakasya |
SA15n2992:486: etaduktaṁ bhavati- anvayaś ca dvitīyaṁ rūpamiti |
SA15n2992:487: evaṁ ca śrāvaṇatva- syāpyanityatve hetos trairūpyaṁ pratipāditaṁ bhavati na tvanyathā |
SA15n2992:490: anvayo hi nāma liṅge liṅgino bhāva eva |
SA15n2992:492: tathā hi- yatra śrāvaṇatvam tatrānityatvaṁ bhavatyeva |
SA15n2992:494: nāstitāsatītyatrāsacchabdena na kevalaṁ tattulyābhāva ucyate api tu tato'nyas tadviruddhaś ca tadākāravivekāditi veditavyam |
SA15n2992:498: samudā- yo'pi yāvaddharmo na sidhyati tāvan na sambhavatyeva |
SA15n2992:499: na hyasannivi- ṣṭena buddhau dharmaṇa viśiṣṭo dharmī yujyate |
SA15n2992:500: siddhe tu dharmiṇi paścāt samudāyo jāyate |
SA15n2992:502: tasmā- danumeye hetoḥ sattvaṁ na sambhavatyeveti kasyacic codyamāśaṅkyāha- anumeyo hītyādi |
SA15n2992:503: atra yadyapi dharmaśabdaḥ sāmānyavācī tathāpi sādhanādhikārād yadarthaṁ sādhanamanviṣyate pratyāsattes tatraiva vartate |
SA15n2992:506: na hyajijñāsite dharmiṇo dharme kaścit prakṣāvān sādhanaṁ pratyāhriyate |
SA15n2992:507: tasmāt siddhisa- ttāke dharmiṇi yatrākṛṣṭaṁ sādhanam sa eva jijñāsito dharmo dharmaśa- bdena pratyāyyate |
SA15n2992:509: tata- ś cāyamevārtho bhavati- jijñāsitaviśeṣo dharmī iti |
SA15n2992:510: tathā hi- yo yena jijñāsitena viśiṣṭo bhavati tasyāsau jijñāsito viśeṣo bhavati |
SA15n2992:511: samudāyaḥ sādhya ityapi vacanaṁ jijñāsitadharmāpekṣayaiva veditavyam ||
SA15n2992:513: na tu liṅgadarśanakāle dharmaviśiṣṭatvamasti asaṁviditatvā- ddharmasyetyapare |
SA15n2992:514: jñāpakasya hetoradhikārāj jñānamarthākṣiptamiti niścityāha- tatra darśanamityādi |
SA15n2992:517: sadhūmaṁ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ pratyakṣeṇa tadbalenaiva yathādṛṣṭabhedaviṣayaṁ niścitaṁ sa evāyamiti smārtaṁ liṅgajñānamuttarakālamutpadyate |
SA15n2992:518: na ca tat pramāṇam anadhi- gatārthakriyāyogyavastvanadhigamāt |
SA15n2992:519: ādyameva tu pramāṇam ato viparyayāt etallakṣaṇatvāt pramāṇasya |
SA15n2992:525: tataś ca ye codayanti- liṅgādijñānasya pratyakṣānumānānantarbhāvāt pramāṇāntaratvaṁ prāpnotīti te jāḍyamevātmanaḥ khyāpayanti ||
SA15n2992:526: anumānato veti kṛtakatvādeḥ kādācitkatvādinā liṅgenānumī- yamānatvāt |
SA15n2992:533: na ca tat pratyakṣādipṛṣṭhabhāvinā viṣayīkartuṁ śakyate jñānena tasya savikalpakatvād vikalpānāṁ ca sāmānyaviṣayatvāt ||
SA15n2992:536: nanu dharmiviśiṣṭasyānyatra vṛttivirodho'viśeṣaṇe vā nānumeyadharmatā syāt |
SA15n2992:537: na ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt yathā caitro dhanurdhara iti |
SA15n2992:538: yadi tarhi sādhanadharmasya viśeṣo'numānānumeyavyavahāraṁ pratya- nupayogīti sāmānyameva liṅgaṁ parigṛhyate sādhyadharmasyāpi tadeva grāhyam |
SA15n2992:546: anumeyatattulyayos tulye sadbhāvavacana ekatra sarvatra sadbhāvo'nyatraikadeśe'pītyetat kuto hetorlabhyata iti pṛcchati |
SA15n2992:547: (35) vyavacchedaphalatvād vākyānāmiṣṭataś cāvadhāraṇādetal labhyata ityāha- tattulya evetyādi |
SA15n2992:548: anenānyayogavyavacchedenātrāvadhāra- ṇamāśritam yathā pārtho dhanurdhara iti darśayati |
SA15n2992:549: yadyevaṁ sādhyadharmi- ṇyavṛttiriti cet na anyaniṣedhārthatvāt |
SA15n2992:550: tatra vṛttau labdhāyāṁ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇamanyad vyavacchinatti naraṁ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṁ babhūva iti yathā ||
SA15n2992:555: sādharmya- vān vaidharmyavāṁś ca prayoga ucyate |
SA15n2992:556: prayogavākyena hi pramāṇaṁ prakāśayatā kimayaṁ nitya uta neti pareṣāṁ saṁśayadolārūḍhā buddhira- nitya evāyamityarthāntarād vyavacchidyānitya eva vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n2992:559: anvayavya- tirekayorniścitavyāptikamekamapi rūpaṁ prayuktamarthād dvitīyaṁ gamayatī- tyekasyāpi prayogaḥ syāditi |
SA15n2992:562: te tvekenāpi vākyena śakye darśayitu- miti prayogasamāsa ucyate na rūpasamāsaḥ |
SA15n2992:564: syādetat- asati nāstitā nopapadyata eva asato'dhikaraṇa- tvādyayogāt |
SA15n2992:565: śaktiprabhāvitāni hi kārakāṇi asataś ca sarvasā- marthyavirahādityata āha- asatveva nāstiteti |
SA15n2992:569: nanvevaṁ sati sattāvati nāstitā na prāpnoti |
SA15n2992:570: naiṣa doṣaḥ iha nā- stitāsatīti lakṣaṇavākye'sati nāstitaivetyavadhāraṇasyeṣṭatvāt |
SA15n2992:573: tadasyāyama- rthaḥ- asati nāstitaiva vastupratiṣedharūpā bhavati na tvastitāvidhi- rūpā vidherasatyayogāt |
SA15n2992:577: asato 'nyatra sattāvati na nāstitaiva bhavati tatra vidherapi sambhavāt |
SA15n2992:578: anena niyamavatyā nāstitāyāḥ sati pratiṣedhaṁ kurvanniyamarahitā nāstitāstītyamumarthaṁ gamayati |
SA15n2992:579: viśiṣṭapratiṣedhena hi tadviparītapra- tītirbhavati nāstīha phalitaḥ palāśa iti yathā |
SA15n2992:581: asati hi paro nāstitāṁ necchati na tu sati ||
SA15n2992:582: (37) kiṁ punaḥ kāraṇamasati niyamavatī nāstitā bhavatītyāha- na viruddha iti |
SA15n2992:584: etad darśayati- yadyasati kaścid vastudharmo vidhīyeta syād doṣaḥ vastudharmasyāsatyasambhavāt |
SA15n2992:590: yo nāstitāyā na viruddhaḥ tatrāsau sambhavati |
SA15n2992:597: jñānaṁ gṛhyate yena taj jñānagrahaṇam yatnāntaram |
SA15n2992:598: etaduktaṁ bhavati- tathā yatnāntaraṁ kartavyam yathā liṅga- viṣayajñānaṁ labhyate |
SA15n2992:600: jñānamapyāttamityādinā sāmarthyākṣiptatvāj jñānasya na tad yatnāntarapratipādyamiti darśayati ||
SA15n2992:602: ekaikaṁ dvedve ca rūpe yasya sa tathoktaḥ |
SA15n2992:607: arthato'yamartho mayā pratipādito vināpi śabdenetyevamākhyāyamānenāpyākhyāto bhavati |
SA15n2992:610: atra codyam- tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanenānvayaḥ pratipādyate |
SA15n2992:614: tat kathamevamuktam- tattulye'sti nāpi tadabhāve nāsti |
SA15n2992:619: sapakṣe sadbhāvamātraṁ vipakṣe ca nāstitvamātraṁ niyamarahitam |
SA15n2992:620: chandato'pi vā- cāṁ pravṛttiḥ arthas tu parīkṣyaḥ |
SA15n2992:621: ayaṁ cātrārtho vivakṣitaḥ- yasyā- nvayavyatirekau na staḥ sa satyapi pakṣadharmatve na hetuḥ |
SA15n2992:622: yasya ca (39) pakṣadharmatvaṁ nāsti so'pi satyapyanvayavyatirekavattve na heturiti |
SA15n2992:623: sa cānenāpi prakāreṇa śakyata eva pratipādayitumiti ||
SA15n2992:624: anāsthāvacanaṁ prati mūrtatvānnityaḥ śabda iti vaiśeṣikamatena nityamūrtaparamāṇuvyapekṣayaikarūpaḥ |
SA15n2992:625: evaṁ nityaḥ śabdaḥ aprame- yatvāditi vipakṣād vyāvṛtterekarūpaḥ |
SA15n2992:626: nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta- tvāditi dvirūpaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ |
SA15n2992:627: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvādityasā- dhāraṇo'yaṁ dvirūpaḥ yadi śabdatvaṁ nityaṁ nābhyupeyate |
SA15n2992:628: anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣatvāditi dvirūpo'yamasiddhaḥ yadi jātayaś cakṣurgrā- hyā neṣyante ||
SA15n2992:630: tad yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣatvādityevamā- dikaḥ |
SA15n2992:631: sa tvanayaiva diśā gamyata iti vṛttau noktaḥ |
SA15n2992:632: sūtre tv ekaikadvidvirūpaś cetyatra caśabdas tatsamuccayārtho draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n2992:634: yatra hi kaści- drūpaikadeśo 'sti sa tadvadābhāsamāno buddhiṁ viparyāsayatīti sa evātrocyata iti ||
SA15n2992:636: ye tvanyathecchanti tanmataṁ nirākartumupanyasyati- atra tvityādi |
SA15n2992:638: yena yasyāvyabhicāro na kathyate na tat tasya sādhyam |
SA15n2992:640: na ca sādhyadharmeṇa hetoravyabhicāro na kathyata iti vyatirekiṇaṁ svabhāvaṁ manyante ||
SA15n2992:642: yat siddham na tat sādhyam uṣṇo 'gniriti yathā |
SA15n2992:645: yo hi kevalaṁ dharmaṁ sādhyamicchati tenāvaśyaṁ tatraiva liṅgaṁ draṣṭavyam |
SA15n2992:647: na hyanya- tra viditaṁ liṅgamanyaṁ pratyāyayati mā bhūdatiprasaṅga iti |
SA15n2992:648: tataś ca liṅgagrahaṇakāla eva liṅgino gatatvāt kimaparamanumīyeta yadarthaṁ sambandhaḥ smaryeta ||
SA15n2992:650: sa eva deśo'gnimattvena kiṁ neṣyata ityevaśrutiḥ kevalasya dharmasya (41)
SA15n2992:652: evaṁ kevalo dharmaḥ sādhyatvena yujyate yadi dharmī nāsyadhāratveneṣyate |
SA15n2992:653: anyathā yatra dharmiṇi liṅgamupalabhyate tatrādhāra āśrīyamāṇe samudāya eva sādhyaḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:656: dharmamātre hi sādhye sattāsya sādhyā syāt |
SA15n2992:657: tac cāyuktam tasyāḥ siddhitvāt yadāha- na hya- gnisattā na pratīteti |
SA15n2992:658: tadanena- yat siddhim na tat sādhyamityā- dikaṁ pūrvoktaṁ svabhāvaviruddhamāha ||
SA15n2992:661: na hyagneḥ pradeśasya ca saṁyogalakṣaṇe sambandhe vahnidhūmau vidyete |
SA15n2992:662: yadi tatra dvayaṁ nāsti kimiti tasya sādhyatvaṁ na bhavatītyāha- evaṁ ca kriyata ityādi |
SA15n2992:664: atra yadi pradeśaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt yujyeta tābhyāṁ tasya pratyavamarśaḥ |
SA15n2992:665: anyathāgnidhūmau svaśabdena nirdiṣṭau prade- śo'pi nānumeyaḥ |
SA15n2992:666: sambandhe'pi dvayaṁ nāstīti nirviṣayau tau syātām |
SA15n2992:667: tadanena- yatrāgnidhūmau na staḥ na sa dhūmenānumeyaḥ ja- lavat- na staś cāgnidhūmau sambandha iti viruddhavyāptamāha ||
SA15n2992:669: sambandhavivakṣāyāṁ hyagniśabdaḥ ṣaṣṭhyantaḥ syāt yathāgneruṣṇaḥ sparśa ityatra |
SA15n2992:671: tato ganyate- nātra sambandho vivakṣita iti |
SA15n2992:675: ṣaṣṭhīśravaṇābhāvena parārthānumāne sphuṭamupalabhya sambandhābhāvaṁ svārthānumāne'pi pratipā- dayati |
SA15n2992:676: tadetaduktaṁ bhavati- yatrāgniśabdaḥ prathāmāntaḥ na tatra sambandhasya pratiyogino vivakṣā |
SA15n2992:681: yadā tarhyanityaḥ śabda iti prathamāntayoreva dharmadharmiṇoḥ prayogaḥ tadā kā kalpanā |
SA15n2992:685: tasyāpi ca sambaddhasya pradeśe sādhyamānatvāt sa eva samudāyaḥ sādhya ityāpannam ||
SA15n2992:686: avācyaḥ svadharmeṇeti sambandhanaṁ hi sambandha iti bhāvarūpeṇa sambandhaśabdenābhidhānāt |
SA15n2992:689: tataś ca samba- ndhyeva sa bhavatīti na svarūpeṇa sambandho'bhidhīyate |
SA15n2992:693: yadi śabdavācyo na bhavati kathaṁ tarhi pratīyata ityāha- arthagṛ- hītaḥ syāditi |
SA15n2992:696: ataḥ saiva pratīyamānā nāntarīyakatvāt saṁyogaṁ gamayatītyarthagṛhīta ityu- cyate adhikaraṇaśaktisvakāryonnīyamānatvāt ||
SA15n2992:699: yadapyuktam- kāryānumeyaḥ sambandha iti tadapi svakāryānumeyatvāduktam na tu dhūmādiliṅgānumeyatvāt |
SA15n2992:700: etaduktaṁ bhavati- yadi nāma sambandho'sti svakāryeṇaivānumīyate na tvanyena dhūmādineti |
SA15n2992:701: yadāha- na tu dhūme- nānumīyata iti |
SA15n2992:703: sambandhe'pi dvayaṁ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati avācya ityetebhyaḥ ||
SA15n2992:704: (44) na cāsau liṅgasaṅgata iti nāvinābhāvalakṣaṇena sambandhena liṅgena sambaddha ityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:705: yasya yenāvinābhāvitvaṁ na pradarśyate na sa tenānumīyate yathā dhūmena jalam |
SA15n2992:706: na pradarśyate ca sambandhena dhūma- syāvinābhāvitvam |
SA15n2992:712: yatra pradeśādāvagnyādiḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ tatra prasiddhaṁ dhūmādiliṅgaṁ yena dharmeṇa tadavinābhūtamanalādinā tatsambaddhaṁ pradeśādikaṁ dharmiṇaṁ gama- yiṣyatītyevamartham ||
SA15n2992:715: ayama- nyatraśabdo dharmiṇi sādhye pradeśādau vartate |
SA15n2992:718: atha vā mātraśabdenedaṁ darśayati- vināpi dharmiṇānugamadarśaneneti ||
SA15n2992:719: eṣa samāsārthaḥ- dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇo'numeyatve'pi yo'gninā dhūmasyāvinābhāvo mahānasādau pradarśyate sa upāya eva pradeśasyā- gnimattvaprasādhanāyeti kṛtvā |
SA15n2992:720: tathā hi- yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgniriti niścayādanyatra dhūmamātraṁ dṛṣṭvā deśamagnimantaṁ pratipadyate |
SA15n2992:724: tatra na tāvad viśeṣeṇa pradarśa- yitavyaḥ anyatra tasyābhāvitvenāśakyatvāt yadāha- anyathā hītyādi |
SA15n2992:725: dharmisāmānyena tu sambhavatyavinābhāvaḥ sa ca tena prada- rśitaḥ yadāha- ādhārasāmānyena tvityādi |
SA15n2992:726: ādheyenāvinā- bhāvitve darśyamāna ādhāreṇāpi darśitaṁ bhavati ādheyatantratvādādhāra- sya ||
SA15n2992:727: atha vā yatra dhūmaḥ tatrāgniriti nānena dhūmasyāgnimātreṇāvinā- bhāvitvaṁ kathyate |
SA15n2992:731: sambandhena tu sarvathāvinābhāvitvasyā- darśanamevetīdamuktam- viṣama upanyāsa iti |
SA15n2992:733: na ca tasya vipakṣe vṛttiriti nānekāntaḥ ||
SA15n2992:735: pūrvamanumeyagato vicāra uktaḥ idānīṁ tu sādhyadharmagato vicāraḥ |
SA15n2992:738: sa punarvicāro yāveva liṅgaliṅginau dharmivadanekadharmakau yathāgnidhūmau tatraiva pratyāyyapratyāyakāṁśanirūpa- (46)
SA15n2992:740: tatrānekadharmakatvāsambhavāt kenāṁśena gamyagamakabhāva ityāśaṅkā na sambhavatyeva ||
SA15n2992:743: yoṁ'śo vahni- manugacchati dravyatvādi tasyānyato vipakṣād vicchedaṁ vyāvṛttiṁ gamayati |
SA15n2992:744: ke punarviśeṣā anubaddhā ityāha- yān antarenāgnirna bhavatīti |
SA15n2992:745: nanu ca dhūmasya sūcakatvād yān antareṇa dhūmo na bhavatīti vaktavyam |
SA15n2992:748: tathā hi- yānantareṇāgnirna bhavati dhūmo'pi tairvinā na bhavatyeva ||
SA15n2992:749: atha vā ye tvanubaddhā iti dhūmasyaivānubaddhā iti yojyam |
SA15n2992:751: ta eva hi dhūmamanubadhnanti yānantareṇāgnirna bhavati |
SA15n2992:753: kasmānnivṛttimātraṁ pratyāyayati na viśeṣamityāha- svasa- mbandhānurūpyādityādi |
SA15n2992:756: sarvatrānagnau na dṛṣṭa ityanena vyatire- kasya prādhānyaṁ vipakṣe sarvatrādarśanena khyāpayati |
SA15n2992:758: apiśabdena kvacin na dṛṣṭo'pīti dyotayannanvayasyāprādhā- nyam |
SA15n2992:759: tadevaṁ yasmādanvayopasarjano vyatirekapradhānaḥ sambandhaḥ sa ca (47)
SA15n2992:760: sāmānyenaiva sambhavati na viśeṣeṇa tasmāt tadānurūpyād vyatire- kamukhenāgnirevātrānagnirna bhavatītyanagninivṛttimātraṁ pratipādayati na viśeṣam |
SA15n2992:761: yathā cāgnitvena sambandhaḥ tathā dravyatvaguṇitvā- dibhirapīti |
SA15n2992:767: tathā hi- tat sarvatrādravye na dṛṣṭam dravye dṛṣṭam |
SA15n2992:768: tatrādravyavyavacchede prathamenāstyekavṛddhiḥ yadapekṣayā gandhenai- kavṛddhyā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate |
SA15n2992:770: ata eva ca guṇatvasyāpyekavṛddhyā vyavacchedakaraṇaṁ pratyaṅgabhāvo 'sti |
SA15n2992:771: yadi hi tenādravyavyavacchedo vidhīyate evaṁ gandhenaikavṛddhyā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate nānyathā |
SA15n2992:772: evaṁ ca śloke dvandvasamāsāntaḥ pātitvaṁ guṇatvaśabdasyāviruddhaṁ bhavati tulyakakṣyatvāt padāntaraiḥ |
SA15n2992:774: pārthivamidaṁ dravyaṁ ca gandhatvādityapā- rthivādadravyāc ca vyavacchedaḥ kriyate |
SA15n2992:776: gandhavadetat saurabhyāditi saurabhyeṇa pūrvakābhyāmasurabhisādhā- raṇāc ca vyavacchedaḥ kriyate |
SA15n2992:777: surabhergandhaviśeṣasya sādhāraṇaṁ sāmā- nyaṁ surabhisādhāraṇam gandhatvamātramiha vivakṣitam |
SA15n2992:778: avidyamānaṁ surabhisādhāraṇaṁ yasya tat tathoktam nirgandhamityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:780: tadevamadravyādivyavaccheda ekaikavṛddhyo- tpalādiṣu guṇatvādibhiḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ ||
SA15n2992:781: sa kathaṁ yujyate yadi vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena hetuḥ pratyāyayati nānyathā dṛṣṭavat |
SA15n2992:782: vidhimukhena hi sarveṣu sarveṣāṁ darśanasyāviśiṣṭatvāt tulyā pratītiḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:784: ye tu tan necchanti tān pratyāha- dṛṣṭavadityādi |
SA15n2992:785: dṛṣṭena tulyaṁ dṛṣṭavat yathā pūrvaṁ sambandhakāle liṅgam upalabdham tathā yadi prakāśayedityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:788: evaṁ sarvatrādarśanān na syāt prakāśanamiti jñeyam prakāśayediti prakrāntatvāt ||
SA15n2992:790: yadyevamabhyupagacched vidhivādī- yasmād vahnāveva dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ nāgnyabhāve tasmādgamayatīti evaṁ sati pratiṣedhadvārakameva prakāśanaṁ syāt |
SA15n2992:791: tasmāt tenaivamabhyupeyam- yasmādagnau dṛṣṭa eva na tvadṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt sa taṁ gamayatīti |
SA15n2992:793: na hi sarvatra so'gnau dṛṣṭaḥ digdaśādibhinne sarvatra vahnau darśanāsambhavāt ||
SA15n2992:795: yadā hi dhūmo'gnau dṛśyate tadā dīptādīnāṁ viśeṣāṇāmanyatamena yukta eva dṛśyate |
SA15n2992:798: tasmān na darśanamātramanumeyapratipattihetuḥ satyapi tasmin tadabhavāditi |
SA15n2992:801: kārya- kāraṇabhāvaś ca darśanādarśanābhyāṁ sahitābhyāṁ sidhyati na kevalā- dadarśanādityāha- yatastvityādi |
SA15n2992:803: sāmānyarūpeṇaiva prakāśayati na viśeṣarūpeṇa dīptādinā tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhaye vidhināpi tadevāsya rūpaṁ dṛṣṭamiti gamyate na viśeṣarūpam kāryakāraṇavyavahārasiddhihetutvenetyabhiprayaḥ |
SA15n2992:804: na hi dīptādiviśeṣadarśanaṁ kāryakāraṇavyavahārasiddhihetuḥ tadabhāve'pi dhū- masya darśanāt |
SA15n2992:805: aṁśena janyajanakabhāva iti cet na tajjanyaviśe- ṣagrahaṇe'bhimatatvāt sarvathā janyajanakabhāvasya |
SA15n2992:808: tasya ca prativyakti sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādekasyāmevāgni- vyaktau darśanopapattiḥ |
SA15n2992:809: tasmāt sarvatrādarśanān na syāt prakāśana- mityayuktametadityāha- sāmānyaṁ yadyapītyādi |
SA15n2992:811: abhyupetya tu doṣa ucyata ityetad darśayati ||
SA15n2992:813: yadi vyakteranyat sāmānyaṁ syāt bhedena buddhau pratibhāseta na ca pratibhāsate |
SA15n2992:815: athānanyat evamapi vyaktivat tat sāmānyameva na syāt |
SA15n2992:818: yadanekāśrayasādhāraṇama- gṛhītasakalāśrayam na tad draṣṭuṁ śakyam yathāgṛhītasakalāśrayaṁ dvitvādi |
SA15n2992:824: athaikāśrayagrahaṇe'pi samastaṁ gṛhyate evaṁ sati tasya pratyekaṁ sarvātmanā parisamāptatvādguṇavadanekatvaṁ syāt |
SA15n2992:825: na hyayaṁ sambhavo'sti- yadekatra sarvātmanā parisamāptam tadanyatrāpīti |
SA15n2992:826: yadanekatra pratyekaṁ sarvātmanā parisamāptam tadanekam guṇavat |
SA15n2992:830: anekatvāc ca tat sāmānyameva na syāt āśrayavat |
SA15n2992:837: pāṇḍutvamiha dhūmasambandhyeva vivakṣi- tam na tu dadhiśarādivṛtti tasya vyabhicārāt |
SA15n2992:838: dravyatvādayo'pi tarhi yadā dhūmopādhayo gṛhyante tadā tairapi kimiti na pratyāyayati |
SA15n2992:843: uktamevārthaṁ saṅgrahaślokābhyāṁ saṅgṛhṇāti sukhapratipattaye- gamyante liṅgatas te'pīti |
SA15n2992:844: te'pyanubandhino dravyatvādayo gamyante nāgni- tvādika eva dharmaḥ yas tadānīṁ boddhumiṣṭa ityapiśabdasyārthaḥ |
SA15n2992:847: liṅgānubandhinas tvarthā ityaviśiṣṭā dravyatvādayaḥ sāmānya- dharmāḥ |
SA15n2992:849: te cāviśiṣṭadravyatvādisā- mānyāpekṣayā viśeṣā ityucyante na tvasādhāraṇarūpāpekṣayā ||
SA15n2992:853: tataś ca yathāyaṁ saṁyogitve saṁyoginornāsti viśeṣaḥ tathā liṅgaliṅginorapi na syāt |
SA15n2992:854: evaṁ ca liṅgasāmānyamapi gamakaṁ syāl liṅgiviśeṣo'pi ca gamyaḥ syāt sambandhasyāviśe- (53) ṣāditi |
SA15n2992:861: tac ca liṅga eva vartate na liṅgini |
SA15n2992:862: abhyu- petya tu dviṣṭhatvaṁ sāhabhāvye satyuttaramucyata iti darśayati |
SA15n2992:864: ādhārādheyayoriva vṛttis tasya liṅgaliṅgisamba- ndhasya na tu saṁyoginoriva ||
SA15n2992:874: sa ca liṅga eva vartate na liṅginītyamunāvadhāraṇadvayena pratipādyate |
SA15n2992:878: yadi- yatra yatra liṅgam tatra tatra liṅgī bhavati |
SA15n2992:879: liṅginas tvanyatra vṛttiranena na pratiṣidhyate liṅge tadabhāva- mātravyavacchedaphalatvādavadhāraṇasya |
SA15n2992:880: tataś ca liṅgini nāvinābhāvi- tvaṁ vartata ityuktaṁ bhavati liṅgādanyatrāpi tadbhāvasūcanāt |
SA15n2992:882: tasmāt teṣāmapi dhūmo gama- kaḥ na tu dīptādīnām |
SA15n2992:883: na hi te dhūme bhavantyeva yadāha- tasmād yuktamityādi |
SA15n2992:884: liṅginyevetarat punarityanenāpi liṅga evāvinābhā- vaḥ pravartata iti sūcayati liṅgino'nyatra liṅgaṁ na bhavatītyarthagateḥ |
SA15n2992:885: liṅginas tu liṅgādanyatra bhāvo na pratiṣidhyate |
SA15n2992:886: yathā ca dhūmatvamagnau bhavatyeva tathā pāṇḍutvādayo'pi viśeṣāḥ |
SA15n2992:887: tasmāt te'pi gamakāḥ na tu dravyatvādayaḥ |
SA15n2992:888: na hi te'gnau bhavantyeva yadāha- tasmād yukta- mityādi |
SA15n2992:890: (55) nanu pūrvaṁ liṅgasya liṅgini sadbhāva uktaḥ tattulye sadbhāva iti vacanāt |
SA15n2992:891: iha tu liṅgino liṅge sadbhava ucyate liṅge liṅgī bhava- tyeveti vacanāt |
SA15n2992:894: liṅgaliṅginore- kādhikaraṇatve yathā liṅge liṅgī bhavati evaṁ liṅgamapītaratra |
SA15n2992:895: kevala- mavadhāraṇavaiparītyena liṅga eva sambandho vartata iti pratipādanāyeda- mucyate |
SA15n2992:896: yadi tarhi liṅga eva vartate kathaṁ sambandho liṅgaliṅgino- rityuktam |
SA15n2992:897: liṅga eva vartamāno'pyasau liṅginaṁ pratiyoginamapekṣya vartata ityevamuktam na tu dviṣṭhatvādityadoṣaḥ ||
SA15n2992:898: nanu cetyādinā yaduktam- niyamasya viparyāse sambandho liṅga- liṅginoriti tad vighaṭayan liṅginyapyavinābhāvo vartata iti darśayati ||
SA15n2992:899: kāmamityādinā yadyapi liṅgamapi kiñcil liṅgini bhavatyeva tathāpi liṅgirūpeṇaiva |
SA15n2992:900: evaṁ ca kṛtakatvasādhyāpekṣayā hetubhūta evāni- tyatve'vinābhāvo vartata iti darśayan svapakṣameva sthāpayati |
SA15n2992:904: yat tadvyāpitvam tal liṅgiviṣayamiti liṅgini vyāpītyuktam |
SA15n2992:908: tato vyāpitvāt kṛtakatvaṁ gamyameva bhavati na gamakam |
SA15n2992:910: yathā viṣāṇaṁ gorvyāpitvādgavāpekṣayā gamyameva sampadyate na tu gamakam tadvaditi |
SA15n2992:911: yo yatra bhavatyeva sa tasya gamakaḥ |
SA15n2992:919: tena liṅgasya yā vyāptiḥ sāpekṣyata āśrīyate tasyā eva gamakatvahetu- tvāt |
SA15n2992:920: tasmāl liṅgasya liṅgiviṣayā yā vyāptiḥ sā vidyamānā- pyakāraṇam gamakatvasya na nimittamityarthaḥ ||
SA15n2992:922: yadyapi sakalānityatvavyāpi kṛtakatvam tathāpi na tena vyāpitvena tasya gamakatvam api tu nityatvapratiṣe- dhena |
SA15n2992:925: na hi vipakṣā- davyāvṛtto hetuḥ sādhyaṁ gamayati prameyatvavat |
SA15n2992:927: yadā kṛtakatvasiddhaye'nityatvaṁ hetutvenopādīyate tadāpya- nityatvasyāśeṣakṛtakatvavyāpitve'pi na tena vyāpitvena gamakatvam |
SA15n2992:930: tadevaṁ yataḥ svasādhyavipakṣavyāvṛttyā hetorgamakatvaṁ bhavati nānyathā tasmād yadanityārthe kṛtakatvasya vyāpitvam tenākṛtakatvānava- kāśād anityatvasyākṛtakatve'navakāśādanavasthitatvādasambhavāc cānityatvena kṛtakatvasyākṛtakatvapratiṣedhenākṛtavyavacchedena ga- myataiva syāt |
SA15n2992:932: na tu gamakatvamiti yasmād vipakṣāpracāreṇa yā vyāptiḥ sā gamakatvanimittam |
SA15n2992:934: tathā hi- yadanityam tat kṛtakamiti vyāptāvupada- rśitāyāṁ na nityāt kṛtakatvasya vyāvṛttirgamyate |
SA15n2992:937: tato'nityatvamevākṛtakatve'navakāśamityakṛta- katvapratiṣedhena gamyataiva kṛtakatvasyānityatvena yujyate na gama- katvamityuktārthasaṅgrahaṁ ślokābhyāṁ karoti ||
SA15n2992:939: anityasya kṛtakatvena vyāpterani- tyatvādakṛtakaṁ na tadityayamartho'prasuta eva gamyate |
SA15n2992:941: yas tu prakṛto nityatvābhāvo'nityatvam sa tayā vyāptyā kṛtake'rthe na pradarśyate ||
SA15n2992:942: asyaivārthasya spaṣṭīkaraṇāya dvitīyena ślokena dṛṣṭāntamāha- aviṣāṇitvaṁ nivartayediti viṣāṇitvaṁ gamayedityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:945: yo'rtho yamantareṇa na bhavati sa tasya nāntarīyakaḥ yathāgnerdhūmaḥ |
SA15n2992:949: sambandhasmṛtyapekṣatāṁ liṅgadarśanasya darśa- yitum- tadvida ityuktam |
SA15n2992:950: yas taṁ vetti- nāntarīyako'yamiti tasyānumānam nānyasya ||
SA15n2992:952: tasya hi nāntarīyakatvameva sva ākāro bhavati |
SA15n2992:954: na hyata- dvido nāntarīyako'yamiti darśanaṁ sambhavati |
SA15n2992:956: vinā hi tena svarūpapadārthakatvaṁ na vijñāyeta |
SA15n2992:957: anyadeva kiñcit tadvido na vācyamityarthagatiḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:960: lopas tu tasya vākyasya svarūpa- pratyāyane vivakṣite prasaktasyādarśanameva prasaktasyādarśanaṁ lopa iti kṛtvā |
SA15n2992:961: anenaitat sūcayati- svarūpapadārthakaṁ tadvida ityetad vedita- (60) vyam |
SA15n2992:962: itikaraṇas tu tadarthanirdeśārho'pi vṛttabhaṅgabhayān na nirdiṣṭa iti ||
SA15n2992:963: anyena yadi vācyaṁ kathaṁ kva veti |
SA15n2992:964: anekākāratvāt tasya vaktavyam- kenākāreṇa darśanaṁ kva vā sthāne |
SA15n2992:965: anucyamāne hi tasmin sthāne niyamo na syāt |
SA15n2992:966: tataś ca ghaṭe cākṣuṣatvadarśanāc chabde'pyanityatvaṁ pratipadyate ||
SA15n2992:967: nanu pūrvasminnapi vikalpe kva darśanamiti vācyamityetac codayituṁ yuktameva |
SA15n2992:969: evam manyate- nāntarīya- katvena darśane yamantareṇa sa na bhavati tatraiva darśanamityanuktamapi gamyata eva tasya pratyāsatteriti ||
SA15n2992:970: artha iti śiṣyata iti arthagrahaṇamatiricyata ityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:975: nanu svākārasya vyabhicāritvān na tenānumānaṁ sambhavati |
SA15n2992:978: tataś ca vṛthārthagrahaṇaṁ syāt arthākāragrahaṇamātrasya nāntarīyakagrahaṇenaiva labdhatvāditi |
SA15n2992:980: vicāraṇāyāmiṣṭo'rthaḥ pakṣa iti atha vā sādhyā- bhidhānaṁ pratijñetyatra |
SA15n2992:983: arthadarśanaṁ nāntarīyakatvavida ityukte yo hi nāntareṇāgnyādimayaṁ dhūmādirbhavatīti vetti tasyaivaṁviduṣo nāntarīya- kārthadarśanameva tad bhavati |
SA15n2992:984: atha vārthadarśanaṁ nāntarīyakatvavida ityukte yasyārthasya sādhye darśanam tannāntarīyakatvavida ityarthaḥ pratīyate |
SA15n2992:989: na ca dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyatā- yāmayaṁ bhedaḥ sambhavati sarvatra dharmiṇo vartamānatvāt |
SA15n2992:990: tataś cāgnyādau dhūmādidarśane niścitā evāgnyādayo bhavantīti kimanyat tadvidānumeyam |
SA15n2992:991: etena yaduktam- sādhye darśanamiti tasyāyuktatva- māha ||
SA15n2992:994: pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdāḥ pramāṇā- nītyuddiśya pratyakṣalakṣaṇe'bhihite tadanantaraṁ prāptāvasaramanumānalakṣa- ṇamāha- tatpūrvakamityādi |
SA15n2992:995: tadanantaraṁ prakṛtaṁ pratyakṣaṁ pūrvaṁ yasya tat tathoktam |
SA15n2992:996: pūrvaṁ yasya pratyakṣeṇa liṅgaliṅginau prasiddhau tatsambandho vā sa evottarakālaṁ liṅgamātradarśanāl liṅginamanumimīta iti pratyakṣa- pūrvaṁ tad bhavati ||
SA15n2992:998: yathā sambandhakāle pratyakṣeṇādhigataṁ vastu tathaivottarakālaṁ liṅgadarśanādapi tatra jñānamupajāyate |
SA15n2992:1002: yathā phalamekaṁ rasataḥ pratyakṣīkṛtya śeṣāṇyapyevaṁrasāni pratyakṣarasena tulyatvāt tadvaditi rasānumānam |
SA15n2992:1003: nanu ca pratyakṣāditarac cheṣaṁ bhavati na tu śeṣavat |
SA15n2992:1004: atas tadviṣayaṁ jñānaṁ kathaṁ śeṣavadviṣayaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:1005: parasparāpekṣaṁ śeṣatvamiti pratyakṣamapītarāpekṣayā śeṣaṁ tena cetarasyāpi tulyatvāc cheṣavattvamityadoṣaḥ ||
SA15n2992:1008: tadviṣaya- mapi jñānaṁ pūrvavat yat kāraṇāt kāryānumānam |
SA15n2992:1011: tadviṣayamapi jñānaṁ śeṣavat yat kāryāt kāraṇānumānam ||
SA15n2992:1013: yathā caitrasya gatipūrvikāṁ deśāntaraprāptimupalabhya tatsāmānyena ravera- pi gatipūrvikāstagiriprāptiranumīyate |
SA15n2992:1014: nirdeśādeva tritve siddhe trivi- dhagrahaṇamekasya pūrvavadanumānasya trikālaviṣayatvena trividhyajñāpanā- rtham |
SA15n2992:1018: atra matupā pūrvavattvaṁ na sambhavatīti vatinā yojayitavyam ||
SA15n2992:1021: ya indriyajñāne na pratibhāsate nāsāvindri- yagrāhyaḥ indriyavat |
SA15n2992:1030: nāpi liṅgaliṅginau pratyakṣāvityetāvataiva vivakṣitārthapratītāvapi sarvatreti grahaṇaṁ keṣāñcidagnidhūmādiṣu pratyakṣā- bhimānanirāsārtham ||
SA15n2992:1032: sarveṣāṁ pūrvavatva ekasyaiva pūrvavattvaṁ bruvatetarayos tan nāstīti pratijñātam |
SA15n2992:1040: na hi sarvamanumānaṁ kāraṇāt kāryaviṣayaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:1041: sambandho'pi cātra nirdiṣṭa eva kārya- kāraṇabhāvapradarśanādityata āha - na matup vyabhicāritvāditi |
SA15n2992:1042: kāryakāraṇabhāvena hi kāryasyaivāvinābhāvo bhavati na kāraṇasya |
SA15n2992:1043: tathā hi- satyapi kāraṇe sahakārivaikalyāt kāryaṁ na bhavati |
SA15n2992:1044: yathā satyapi meghe kṛṣīvalānāṁ dharmābhāvād vṛṣṭiḥ |
SA15n2992:1045: satyapi ca kāra- ṇāntarasamādhāne viruddhenādharmādinā pratibandhāt ||
SA15n2992:1047: na ca tasya pratibandhaḥ śakyate kartum |
SA15n2992:1051: na cāpratyakṣe kārye tathāvidhakāraṇāva- gatiḥ yataḥ kāraṇāt tat pratīyeta |
SA15n2992:1055: nāyaṁ niyogaḥ - tulyarūpādinā tulyarasena bhā- vyam |
SA15n2992:1056: etāvat tu syāt- evaṁsvabhāvānyetatsamānahetūni caivaṁrasā- nīti |
SA15n2992:1062: ataḥ kāryarūpe- ṇāpratītau satyāṁ liṅgasyānumeye kāraṇe'vinābhāvi- tvagrahaṇādavagatirna syāt |
SA15n2992:1065: ta- t kathaṁ kāryatāmagṛhītvāvinābhāvitvaṁ śakyate niścetum |
SA15n2992:1066: śāstradṛṣṭakā- ryatāgrahaṇātikramo'tra vivakṣitaḥ na tu lokaprasiddhakāryatāgrahaṇā- tikrama ityadoṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:1067: śāstre hi jaladhārāvayavinaḥ sajātīyairevāpyaiḥ pa- ramāṇubhirārabhyante |
SA15n2992:1068: jaladās tu paramāṇvākarṣaṇaṁ prati nimittatvamupa- yanto vṛṣṭikāraṇavyapadeśabhājo bhavantīti vyavasthā |
SA15n2992:1069: na caivaṁvidhaṁ kā- ryakāraṇabhāvaṁ lokaḥ pratyeti |
SA15n2992:1071: jaladeṣu satsu vṛṣṭidarśanāt tadabhāve cādarśanādeva sākṣādeva vṛṣṭer jalādā eva kāraṇamityevaṁ darśa- nādarśanābhyāṁ kāryakāraṇabhāvamavasyati |
SA15n2992:1072: śāstradṛṣṭas tu kāryakāra- ṇabhāvo nopapadyata eva nityānāṁ paramāṇūnāmasiddheḥ siddhāvapyavi- kāritvādākraṣṭumaśakyatvāt ākṛṣṭānāmapi kramayaugapadyābhyāṁ kāryā- rambhāyogāt avayavikāryasya ca vastusato dhīmadbhir vistare- ṇānyatra niṣiddhatvādityalamatiprasaṅgena ||
SA15n2992:1076: anyeṣāṁ darśanam - ekasyāvayavinaḥ śarīrāderekasmādavayavāduda- rādeḥ pratyakṣādhigatād yo'nyo'vayavaḥ pṛṣṭhādiḥ sa śeṣaḥ |
SA15n2992:1080: na hi kadācidapi kukṣiḥ pṛ- ṣṭhādinā vinopalabdhapūrva iti |
SA15n2992:1082: sarvatraiva hyanu- māne pratyakṣārthavyatirikta evārtha sampratipattiḥ |
SA15n2992:1086: pūrvavadityatra vatipakṣe viṣāṇādiliṅgena gavā- rthānumāne samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ |
SA15n2992:1088: iha- buddheś ca tena sambandhāsiddheḥ pratibandhābhāvāc cāliṅgayoga iti na tataḥ sa sidhyati |
SA15n2992:1089: tataś ca sāsnāder liṅgād gavārthānumānaṁ na syāt |
SA15n2992:1091: tathā hi- ekasāmagyradhīnasāsnādyavayavā- tmako gauriti yuktyā vimṛśanto'vinābhāvaṁ niścitya sāsnāder li- ṅgād gavārthe'numānaṁ kurvanti |
SA15n2992:1096: na ca tadāgṛhītasakalāśra- yo'nekārthasādhāraṇatvād dvitvādivat saṁyogaḥ paricchidyate ||
SA15n2992:1097: (69) matuppakṣe tu meghādīnāṁ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saha samba- ndhaḥ ||
SA15n2992:1098: śeṣavatyapi ced vatiriti vatipakṣe rūpasya rasenaikārthasamavāya ityete yathoktāḥ |
SA15n2992:1102: kāraṇatvādīnāṁ kāryatvādi- bhiḥ saha liṅgaliṅgabhāvena sambandha iṣyamāṇe kāraṇatvādeḥ kāryatvādi- mātrāpekṣatvāt tato liṅgini kāryatvādyākārameva jñānaṁ syāt na vṛ- ṣṭyādyākāram |
SA15n2992:1104: na hi sambandhamantareṇa liṅgāl liṅgijñānam utpadyate |
SA15n2992:1105: liṅgaṁ ca yathā yena saha sambaddham tathā tameva gamayati nānyamanyathā mā bhūdati- prasaṅga iti |
SA15n2992:1106: kāraṇatvādinā ca meghādayaḥ kāryatvādinā vṛṣṭyādīnāṁ sa- mbaddhā iti tanmātragatiḥ syāt ||
SA15n2992:1107: (70) syādetat- sarvātmanā teṣāṁ kāryakāraṇabhāvādayaḥ sambandhāḥ nāṁśena |
SA15n2992:1108: tato'yamaprasaṅgaḥ viśeṣāṇāmapi sambandhitvādityāha- sa- rvākāragrahaṇaṁ cetyādi |
SA15n2992:1109: sthūlabindukā vṛṣṭiraśanimatītyādyapi grahaṇaṁ syāt evamādibhirapyākāraiḥ saha kāraṇakāryādibhāvāt |
SA15n2992:1110: asmākaṁ tu yadyapi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ tathāpi nāyaṁ prasaṅgaḥ tathā ni- ścetumaśakyatvāt |
SA15n2992:1111: parasya ca niścayātmakaṁ pratyakṣamiṣṭaṁ tadviṣayaś cā- navayavaḥ |
SA15n2992:1112: tato yadi tad gṛhṇāti sarvathā tena sa grāhyo na vā katha- ñcidityuktam |
SA15n2992:1114: pūrvatra ye'bhihitā doṣāḥ- sambandhāntarato gatiḥ kāryamātrādyanu- mānaṁ sarvākāragrahaṇaṁ cetyādayaḥ tān sāmānyato dṛṣṭe'pyatideṣṭumā- ha- sāmānyadṛṣṭamapyevamiti ||
SA15n2992:1116: kas tarhi pūrvābhyāṁ tasya viśeṣa ityāha- atyantaparokṣa iti ||
SA15n2992:1124: na hi tadevedaṁ hitamahitaṁ cetyādyasmaratas tāḥ kasyacit samupajāyante |
SA15n2992:1126: yat karaṇam tat ka- rmaṇi kriyāphalam paraśuvat |
SA15n2992:1130: vyapadeśo na sidhyatīti yasmādanumeyameva mukhyaṁ pūrvavaccheṣava- t jñānaṁ tūpacāreṇa |
SA15n2992:1132: na ca liṅgajñānaṁ tadviṣayam yatas tathā vyapadeśo'sya syāt liṅga- sya pūrvavaccheṣavattvenāsaṁvarṇitatvāc chāstra ityabhyupetahāniḥ ||
SA15n2992:1134: tathā hi- tatraivoktam- ekaikasya vā traividhyajñāpanārthamuktaṁ trividhamiti |
SA15n2992:1141: pakṣilas tvāha- dravyādipadārthapratiṣedhāc chabde guṇatvasampratipa- ttiḥ śeṣavaditi |
SA15n2992:1142: atrāpi sambandhānirdeśādanumānatvameva tasya durla- bham kutaḥ punas traividhyam |
SA15n2992:1148: na hi pūrve- ṇa tulyamityākāramātranirdeśān nirdiṣṭaṁ bhavati smṛtyādiṣvapi pū- rvadad grahaṇāt |
SA15n2992:1149: tathā śeṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa tulyamityatrāpi naiva samba- ndho nirdiṣṭa iti |
SA15n2992:1155: tatra yat sākṣādālocanamarthānāṁ yathā gaurevāyamaśca evāyamiti tat pra- tyakṣam |
SA15n2992:1157: ta- sya tvatiprasajyamānasya liṅgaliṅginiyamāya sāmayiko lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ kriyate |
SA15n2992:1161: yadā kha- lvasyedaṁ prasiddhamasandigghaṁ ca bhavati- asya kāraṇasya jñāpane bhā- vane va samarthasyedaṁ vyaṅgyamabhinirvartyaṁ vā kāryamiti athāsya kāra- ṇālocanādagṛhyamāṇe'pi kārye'nuvyavasāyo bhavati yathā dinakaro- dayadarśanād ghaṭābhivyaktau |
SA15n2992:1162: tantūn vātānavitānāvasthitāṁs tantu- vāyādhiṣṭhātān dṛṣṭvā bhāvini paṭe ||
SA15n2992:1163: (74) evam- yadāsyedaṁ prasiddhamasandigdhaṁ ca bhavati- asya kāryasya vyaṅgyasya nirvartyasya vedaṁ kāraṇamiti athāsya kāryālocanādi- tyādi yathāyogaṁ vācyam ||
SA15n2992:1164: sambandhi dvividham- saṁyogi ca yathā dhūmo'gneḥ samavāyi ca yathā viṣāṇaṁ goḥ ||
SA15n2992:1165: ekārthasamavāyyapi dvividham- kāryaṁ kāryāntarasya kāraṇaṁ kāraṇāntarasya |
SA15n2992:1166: tatra kāraṇasyaikārthasamavāya ekasthārtheṣu samavā- yaḥ kāryasya punarekasminnarthānāṁ samavāya iti vigrahabhedāt |
SA15n2992:1167: tatra kāryāt kāryāntare'numānam tad yathā rūpāt sparśe kāraṇāt kāraṇāntare tad yathā pādāt pāṇau ||
SA15n2992:1168: virodhi caturvidham- abhūtaṁ bhutasya tad yathāvidyamānaṁ va- rṣakarma sato vāyvabhrasaṁyogasya tasmin sati varṣakarmābhāvāt |
SA15n2992:1169: bhūta- mabhūtasya tadeva varṣakarma vidyamānaṁ tasyaiva vāyvabhrasaṁyogasyātivṛtta- tāṁ pravṛttyabhāvaṁ gamayati |
SA15n2992:1171: dravatva- kāryeṇa syandanena virodhād dravatvena virodho darśitaḥ |
SA15n2992:1173: sya ativṛttā śyāmatā ghaṭe pākajarūpotpattāvativṛttasya ghaṭāgni- saṁyogasya ||
SA15n2992:1174: kāryakāraṇe nānumitihetū ityuktamiti parābhimate ityabhiprā- yaḥ |
SA15n2992:1175: nanu ca janyajanakalakṣaṇe tatra kāryakāraṇe niṣiddhe na vyaṅgya- vyañjakalakṣaṇe |
SA15n2992:1178: tathā hi- sahakāriṇiḥ prakāśādupādānāpekṣāj jñānajananayo- gyakṣaṇāntarotpattireva ghaṭādīnāṁ vyaktiḥ anyathānapekṣa tatkṛ- tamupakāraṁ jñānotpādanaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:1179: paras tūtpattivyatiriktāmeva rūpa- mapi jaḍato ghaṭāderabhivyaktiṁ manyate |
SA15n2992:1181: jñānajananasāmarthyamabhivyaktiriti cet evaṁ tarhi ghaṭādirevābhi- vyañjakena kriyata ityāpannam sāmarthyasya tadātmabhūtatvāt arthā- ntaratve ghaṭādyanupakāraprasaṅgāt |
SA15n2992:1182: sāmarthyāc ca jñānotpatter nityaṁ gha- ṭādīnāmagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:1184: tasyā- pi tatra sāmarthyamiti cet kevalo'pi janayet |
SA15n2992:1186: janayati na kevala iti cet keyamanupakāryasyāpekṣā |
SA15n2992:1187: jñānamabhi- vyaktiriti cet nityaṁ ghaṭāderagrahaṇaprasaṅga ityādi sarvaṁ punarāvartate |
SA15n2992:1192: tat kutas tais tasya tena vā teṣāmanumānam |
SA15n2992:1193: sattve'pi tasya na kāraṇādanumi- tir yuktā vyabhicārādityuktam ||
SA15n2992:1194: syādetat- samagreṇa kāraṇena kāryasya sambhavo'numīyata ityayu- ktametat niścayātmakasya pratyakṣasyābhyupagamāt |
SA15n2992:1195: kāraṇaṁ hi jana- kameva vā syādasambhavatpratibandham ajanakameva vā niryatpratibandha- m |
SA15n2992:1196: pūrvakalpe tat tena rūpeṇa pratyakṣeṇa niścitamiti tato viśiṣṭakā- ryotpādānumānameva syāt |
SA15n2992:1198: yathā hi kāraṇāt kāryaṁ pa- ricchidya tadarthaṁ pravartamānā vipralabhyamānā dṛśyante |
SA15n2992:1199: dvitīye tu pakṣe kāraṇameva tan na bhavatīti niścaye sati kutas tataḥ kāryasambhavānu- (77) mānam |
SA15n2992:1200: na hi śītasyāgnira hetur na bhavatīti niścaye sati kaścid- gninā śītasambhavo'numīyate |
SA15n2992:1207: kathaṁ punas tadagatau siddhirityāha- dṛṣṭo hītyādi |
SA15n2992:1208: saṁyogasya hi dviṣṭhatvād dvitvavat sarvāśrayadarśanapūrvakameva grahaṇaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:1209: anu- mānakāle cāśrayasya sarvasyādarśanāt saṁyogasya grahaṇaṁ na sambhavatye- va |
SA15n2992:1211: syādetat - avidita evāsāvanumitihetur bhaviṣyatītyāha- jñānakāraṇatve- naivetyādi svaviṣayajñānahetutvenetyarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:1212: sarva eva hi jñāpakaḥ svavi- ṣayaṁ jñānamupajanayan jñāpyamarthaṁ jñāpayati pradīpavat |
SA15n2992:1215: yaḥ saṁyogāśrayaḥ sa dvitīye pratiyogini pratītihetuḥ |
SA15n2992:1219: nanu ca dhūma- syāpi vāsagṛhādiṣvanagner bhāvo dṛṣṭa eva |
SA15n2992:1220: tat ko'nayor viśeṣaḥ yenaikatrābhivyañjakatvaprasaṅgaś codyate netaratra |
SA15n2992:1221: evaṁ manyate- dhūmasya saṁyogitvaṁ yadyapi vartamānaṁ nāsti bhūtapūrvaṁ tu vidyata eva naimitti- kasya nimittāvyabhicārāt |
SA15n2992:1224: na cāvaśyaṁ nimittāani naimittikavanti bha- vanti |
SA15n2992:1225: atas tasya kasyāñcidavasthāyāṁ bhūtapūrvamapi saṁyogitvaṁ na sa- mbhavatīti |
SA15n2992:1226: tadevam- yataḥ kadācidagnir dhūmasya nimittaṁ kadācid- nimittam tasmād vyabhicāritvān na tasya dhūmaṁ pratyabhivyañjakatva- m |
SA15n2992:1230: kathaṁ punas tulye saṁyogitve vahneranaikāntikatvam na dhūmasye- tyāha- na hi so'vaśyamityādi ||
SA15n2992:1234: tata- ś ca yathaikasya prāptiḥ tathā dvitīyasyeti |
SA15n2992:1236: syādetat- saṁyogasya kaścidāśrayo vyabhicārī yas taṁ vya- bhicarati |
SA15n2992:1242: yadāyamasyāśrayo vyabhicārī ayamavyabhicārītyevaṁ punar vyabhicāryavyabhicāryāśrayatvena vicārapūrva- kaṁ gṛhyate tadaivāvyabhicāriṇyāśraye gamakatvam ādadhmaḥ |
SA15n2992:1243: tatas te- naivāvyabhicāriṇānumānaṁ kartavyamiti nāsti yathoktadoṣāvakāśa ityāha- na hītyādi |
SA15n2992:1244: sakṛdasakṛd vā gṛhyamāṇaḥ saṁyogo na kañca- nātmātiśayaṁ pratipadyate yenāsakṛd gṛhyamāṇasya tasyānumitikāra- ṇatvaṁ syāt |
SA15n2992:1245: yadi ca sa gṛhīto'pi san punarapi vyabhicāryavyabhicā- ryāśrayatvena grahaṇamapekṣate evaṁ satyanya evāvinābhāvitvasamba- ndho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt na saṁyogaḥ |
SA15n2992:1247: tataś ca kuto'sya vyabhicāryavyabhicāri- tvena vicāraṇeti ||
SA15n2992:1248: yasyāpyavinābhāvitvaṁ sambandhaḥ tasyāpi kathamayaṁ doṣo na bha- vatītyāha- yasya tvityādi |
SA15n2992:1251: yad rūpamagner dhūmasaṁyogi tad dhū- magamyam agnyādirūpavat |
SA15n2992:1253: tathā yad dhūma- sya rūpaṁ vahnisaṁyogi tadagner gamakam dhūmatvādirūpavat |
SA15n2992:1255: dīptādiśrutyā cātra tadvada- gnirūpamevoktam na tu guṇasāmānye tayoḥ saṁyogitvāsambhavāt ||
SA15n2992:1259: sambhavagrahaṇena- bhūta eva virodhi- nyayaṁ prasaṅgaḥ na tvabhūte tasya sāmānyaviśeṣānupapatteriti darśaya- ti ||
SA15n2992:1261: liṅgasya dhūmāderanyena yat sāmānyaṁ dravyatvādi- rūpaṁ ye ca viśeṣā dīptādayaḥ tadubhayamapi dyotakadyotyaṁ na bhavati |
SA15n2992:1262: atra ca vyavahitaḥ sambandho draṣṭavyaḥ - liṅgasyānyena sāmānyaṁ vi- śeṣāś ca liṅgino na dyotakadyotyamiti |
SA15n2992:1264: anyeṣāṁ tu vaiśeṣikādīnāṁ sarvathā prasajyate dyotakadyotyam saṁyogādeḥ sambandhasyāviśiṣṭatvāditi ||
SA15n2992:1265: saṁyogimātrādhigamaprasaṅga iti saṁyogyākāramātreṇa grahaṇamanu- meyasya prāpnotītyarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:1267: samba- ndhānurūpyeṇa hi liṅgaṁ liṅginaṁ gamayati |
SA15n2992:1268: ataḥ saṁyogavaśena liṅgaṁ pratyāyayat saṁyogirūpeṇa gṛhītaṁ tenaiva rūpeṇa pratyāyayet saṁyogya- (81)
SA15n2992:1270: tathāpyuktam- yadāsyedaṁ saṁyogi prasi- ddhamasandigdhaṁ ca bhavati athāsya sambandhino grahaṇādagṛhyamāṇe'pi sambandhinyanuvyavasāyo bhavatīti ||
SA15n2992:1273: yat punaruktam- athāsyetyādi tatra sambandhinītyanena viśeṣa eva parāmṛṣyate na tu saṁyogisamavāyirūpamātramityāha- na cātretyā- di ||
SA15n2992:1275: yadi dhūmena saṁyo- gināgnisattā sādhyeta syādagnidhūmasaṁyogasyānumitāvaṅgabhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:1284: tatra kutas tato viśeṣagatirityāha- anyathā hītyādi |
SA15n2992:1290: nanu cāsiddhaṁ viśeṣaṇam dhūmasyaivātretyanena vivakṣitatvādityāha - dhūme'gnirityādi |
SA15n2992:1291: pratijñārthaikadeśatvaṁ tu sādhyadharmiṇa eva hetutve- nābhidhānāt |
SA15n2992:1292: nanu ca viśeṣaḥ pratijñārthaikadeśaḥ sāmānyaṁ hetuḥ |
SA15n2992:1294: evaṁ manyate- agnidhūmayoḥ saṁyogaṁ sambandhamicchatā heturapi viśeṣa eva svalakṣaṇātmako'bhyupeyaḥ na sāmānyam a- nyathā saṁyogo na sambhavet dravyayoreva parasparaṁ yasmādasau śāstra iṣyate |
SA15n2992:1296: atrāpi caitad va- ktavyameva - na cātrāgnisattā sādhyate tasyāḥ pratītatvādityādi |
SA15n2992:1297: tan nāmottaraṁ vācyam yatra yathokto doṣo nāvatarati |
SA15n2992:1298: iha tu dhūma- viśeṣe'pyagnau sādhye sa doṣas tadavastha eva |
SA15n2992:1300: yadi tarhi dravyayoreva mithaḥ saṁyoga iti samayaḥ nanvevamagnirapi viśeṣa eva svalakṣaṇaparyāyaḥ sādhyatvenābhyupeyaḥ |
SA15n2992:1301: tataś ca sādhyasā- dhanayoḥ svalakṣaṇātmakatvāt sarvo heturasādhāraṇaḥ syāt dṛṣṭāntaś (83)
SA15n2992:1304: ata evāha- tasmān na li- ṅgaliṅginoravaśyaṁ saṁyoga iti |
SA15n2992:1306: ya- smādevaṁ saṁyoge sambandhe doṣaḥ tasmāl liṅgaliṅginor naiva saṁyogaḥ sambandho'bhyupagantavyaḥ avaśyaṁgrahaṇena hyavadhāraṇaṁ darśitam |
SA15n2992:1310: na hi tat sarvadā liṅga- sya sambhavati |
SA15n2992:1311: tathā hyagniśūnyayorapi deśakālayoḥ kadācid dhūma upalabhyata ityāha- deśakālavyapekṣaṁ tvityādi |
SA15n2992:1312: yāvati deśe dhū- mo'gnimantareṇa na dṛṣṭaḥ tadapekṣayāvinābhāvitvaṁ bhavati |
SA15n2992:1313: yāvatā vā kālenāraṇinirmathanādyavasthāyām ādhiśabdādanyasyāṁ cāva- sthāyāṁ sannihitadahanāyām dhūmo'gnināvinābhāvyupalabdhaḥ ta- dapekṣayāvinābhāvitvam ||
SA15n2992:1315: yo nopalabdhaḥ sambandhaḥ na so'pyanumi- tikāraṇam yathā kayościdaprasiddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:1320: ya- syāpi samavāyaviṣayā vyutpattir nāsti tasyāpi viṣāṇādāvavi- nābhāvitvasmaraṇād gavādeḥ sampratipattir dṛṣṭā |
SA15n2992:1321: tato'vinābhāvi- tvamevānumiter hetuḥ tadbhāvābhāvayos tadvattvāt bījamivāṅkurasya ||
SA15n2992:1322: atrāpyetadevetyādinaikārthasamavāyasya samavāyadoṣavattāmāha a- trāpi cetyādināpi saṁyogadoṣavattām |
SA15n2992:1323: syādetat- asan sandi- gdhaś cānapadeśa ityapavādo'sti |
SA15n2992:1324: tato na rūpasya sparśād vāyā- vanumitirityāha- vyabhicāritve cetyādi ||
SA15n2992:1328: tato'pi kāraṇakāraṇāt kāryakārye śarīre sampratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA15n2992:1329: kathaṁ punaḥ śarīrasya śiro'vayavasya caikārthasama- vāyaḥ yāvatā vigrahabhedād dvividhamekārthasamavāyi darśitam ekā- rthena samavāya iti vigrahāntarasamāśrayāt |
SA15n2992:1334: yasyaitat prasiddhamasandigdhaṁ ca bhavati- te śiraḥ prabhṛta- (85)
SA15n2992:1337: na ca mūrdhāderanāśe tadavayavā vibhaktā bhavantīti tasyaivaṁvidhaḥ sampra- tyayo bhavati- abhūc charīram yasyāyamavayavāvayava iti |
SA15n2992:1339: nanu ca tata eva dṛṣṭavinaṣṭāc chirasaḥ sampratyayaḥ na tadavayavāt |
SA15n2992:1343: vā- yvabhrasaṁyogo hi varṣakarmaṇā virodhīti tayoḥ sahānavasthānāt |
SA15n2992:1346: ta- dabhāva iti vayvabhrasaṁyoge sati varṣakarmābhāvāt |
SA15n2992:1347: na ca varṣakarmā- bhāvavāyvabhrasaṁyogayor virodha iti sahāvasthānāt |
SA15n2992:1351: tadviśeṣatve vā- bhāva eva na syāt viśeṣasya bhāvātmabhūtatvāt |
SA15n2992:1352: arthāntaratve vā sa eva doṣaḥ - yad virodhi na tal liṅgamityanuttarametat ||
SA15n2992:1371: sadanityaṁ dravyavat kāryaṁ kāraṇaṁ sāmānyaviśe- ṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣa iti vacanāc chāstre dravyaguṇakarma- ṇāmeva kāraṇabhāva uktaḥ |
SA15n2992:1372: iha cābhūtaṁ bhūtasyetyevamādinābhāvasya kāraṇābhidhānāt praśnaḥ- kathamabhāvo bhāvasya liṅgamiti |
SA15n2992:1378: yasya dhūmo'gneḥ saṁyogīti pūrvaṁ sa- mbandhagrahaṇakāle prasiddho bhavati tasyaiva dhūmadarśanādagnāvanumānam (87) netarasya |
SA15n2992:1380: tadviṣayasya tu liṅga- tvamaupacārikam yathā candanatuleti ||
SA15n2992:1382: yasya yena saha sambandho nāsti na tat tasya liṅgam yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭasya |
SA15n2992:1383: nāsti ca liṅgino liṅga- dhiyā sambandha iti vyāpakābhāvamāha ||
SA15n2992:1385: prasiddhiliṅga ātmetyukte pareṇoktam- na pra- siddhirātmano liṅgamanyatvāt |
SA15n2992:1388: etaduktaṁ bhavati- na sarvama- rthāntarasya liṅgam |
SA15n2992:1390: yadeva kāryakāraṇādisambaddhānāmanyata- mena sambaddham tadevāpadeśa iti ||
SA15n2992:1392: laiṅgikamiti vacanādasmin sūtre li- ṅgajñānaṁ laiṅgikatvena nirdiṣṭamiti tasya liṅgatvapratijñāne'bhyupetabādhā ||
SA15n2992:1393: atha manyase - anumeyajñānamatra laiṅgikatvena nirdiṣṭam na liṅgajñāna- mityāha- anumeyajñāne hītyādi |
SA15n2992:1396: anumeyajñānasya tu laiṅgikatve tadutpattāvadhigataḥ so'rtha iti phalābhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:1401: yadi sambandhasmaraṇaṁ pramāṇam evaṁ sati yo'pi liṅgaṁ na paśyati tasyāpi dhūmasambandhasmaraṇādagnipratītiḥ syāt |
SA15n2992:1403: tatsahitaṁ hi sambandhasmaraṇamanumānamiṣyata eva yadāha- tadetat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa cānumitikāraṇatvādubhayamapyanu- mānamiti ||
SA15n2992:1405: asyedaṁ kāryamityādi yaj jñānam taditikaraṇo dyotayati |
SA15n2992:1406: yadi tarhi liṅgajñānaṁ laiṅgikam avyutpannasyāpi liṅgadarśanamātrādadhiga- tiḥ syāditi |
SA15n2992:1408: sambandhasmṛ- tyapekṣatvaṁ tu tasya prasiddhapūrvakatvādapadeśasyetyasmāl labhyate ||
SA15n2992:1410: liṅgaśabdo'yaṁ kāraṇaparyāyaḥ anekārthatvād dhātūnāṁ liṅgyate janyate kāryamaneneti vyutpatteḥ |
SA15n2992:1413: ataś ca yaduktam - asambandhān na liṅgadhīr liṅgamiti asya siddhasādhyatā kāraṇahetor viva- kṣitatvāditi |
SA15n2992:1415: anumeye cihnabhūta- syeti jñāpakasyetyarthaḥ anumeyaṁ cihnyate jñāyate'neneti kṛtvā |
SA15n2992:1417: yadi janakasyāpi liṅgasyādhikāraḥ syāt ā- tmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣā api vaktavyāḥ syuḥ |
SA15n2992:1421: syādetat- anumeyajñānaṁ prati liṅgajñānasya sākṣātkāraṇatvam nā- nyasya |
SA15n2992:1422: ato mukhyakāraṇatvāl liṅgajñānamevoktamityāha - na ca sākṣādityādi |
SA15n2992:1425: ato vacanāt sambandhasmṛtiḥ sidhyet na tu sambandhini dhūmādau pratipattiḥ |
SA15n2992:1426: tathā hi bhāṣyam- yasya dhūmādināmagnyādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ siddha ityādi |
SA15n2992:1428: yasmāt tatraivoktam - kathamavagamyate - prasiddhapūrvaka evāpadeśa iti |
SA15n2992:1432: na prasiddhaḥ taṁ prati dhūmādayo'napadeśā iti tasmādajñāpakamidaṁ liṅgajñānasya laiṅgikatve ||
SA15n2992:1434: śāstre kāryatvāt kāraṇato vikā- rāt saṁyogād vibhāgāc chabdāc ca śabdaniṣpatter anityaḥ śabda iti kāryatvādayaḥ śabdānityatvahetava uktāḥ |
SA15n2992:1437: tatraitat syāt- tānyapi kārya- tvādīni kāryādiṣvantarbhavantītyāha- na hyeṣāmityādi |
SA15n2992:1439: nanu kāryatvaṁ sadakāraṇatvaṁ caikārthasamavāyitve'ntarbhavati ekasmi- nnarthe śabdādau kāryatvānityatvayor nityatvasadakāraṇatvayoś cātmādau samavāyāt |
SA15n2992:1441: ekārthasamavāyi hi kāryaṁ kāryāntarasya kā- raṇaṁ kāraṇāntarasyetyuktam |
SA15n2992:1449: tan na vyaṅgyavyañjakatvenātra kāryakāraṇatvamabhipretamiti pratī- yate ||
SA15n2992:1453: avinābhāvitvena hi dhūmāder liṅgādanumeyamavaga- myāyamasya vyañjaka iti manasā kalpyate |
SA15n2992:1455: kalpayatīti vā prakṛtamihāpi sambandhanīyam niṣprayojanameva paro'syānumitikāraṇatvaṁ kalpaya- tītyarthaḥ ||
SA15n2992:1456: anye punarāhuḥ - avinābhāva eva sambandho'numitikāraṇamiha śāstre nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA15n2992:1460: pi liṅgatvena nirdeśāt tasya cāvinābhāvāt sambhavānumānasyāpi pa- ramatenāsambhavāditi ||
SA15n2992:1462: vistareṇānumānaṁ vidyeteti sthite tataḥ sva- rūpaparijñānāya pareṇa - kimidamanumānaṁ nāmetyukta āha - samba- ndhādekasmādityādi ||
SA15n2992:1465: sambaddhānāmarthānāmiti ca nirdeśāt sūtre karmasādhanaḥ sambandhaśabdo jñeyaḥ ||
SA15n2992:1476: kāryakāraṇabhāvena vā parasparopakāralakṣaṇena ra- thāṅgavat sattvādivac ca śabdādibhāvena pariṇatau |
SA15n2992:1477: nimittanaimittika- bhāvena vānyataropakāralakṣaṇena kulālaghaṭavat puruṣapradhānavṛttivac ca |
SA15n2992:1485: tasmādidānīmindriyapratyakṣāda- rthāt purastāt samūhe kṛtasambandhād buddhiraviśiṣṭasyārthasyāstitvaṁ pra- tipadyate |
SA15n2992:1486: tad yathā puro dhūmāgnyoḥ sambandhaṁ dṛṣṭvā dhūmadarśanādagnerapi sattvaṁ pratipadyata iti ||
SA15n2992:1488: liṅgajñānaṁ sambandhasmṛtyapekṣaṁ tadviśeṣasyāpratya- kṣasya sambandhinaḥ siddhihetuḥ |
SA15n2992:1491: liṅgajñānaṁ tu kiñcidaniścitamapi syāditi bāṣpādisādhāraṇaṁ pāṇḍutvādimātraṁ dṛṣṭavataḥ - kimayaṁ dhūma uta bāṣpādiriti sandehāt |
SA15n2992:1492: ayathārthaṁ ceti bāṣpādau dhūma iti grahaṇāt |
SA15n2992:1494: yaduktam- ekasmāt pratyakṣāditi tasyaitad viśe- ṣaṇam |
SA15n2992:1496: sāmānyataḥ śrotrādivṛttyā gra- haṇāt pratyakṣam viśeṣataḥ saṁśayaviparyayābhyāmanavadhāritam |
SA15n2992:1499: dhūma eva ye vartante vi- śiṣṭāḥ pāṇḍutvādayaḥ taddarśanād viśeṣeṇa pratipadyate - dhūma evā- yamityevam |
SA15n2992:1502: mandamandaprakāśe gavāśvocite deśe gopramāṇamārupaṁ dṛṣṭvā sandihānā buddhir viśeṣadarśanād viśeṣeṇa pratipadyate - gauraśva iti ceti |
SA15n2992:1503: ārūpaṁ dṛṣṭveti īṣadrupaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁsthānamātraṁ dṛṣṭvetyarthaḥ ||
SA15n2992:1504: evaṁ ceṣyamāṇa iti sāmānyato gṛhītasya punar viśeṣeṇa grahaṇa iṣyamāṇe |
SA15n2992:1509: ato 'rthāntarāpekṣayāsyānena sārūpyamasya vāto viśeṣa iti bhavati |
SA15n2992:1510: na ca śrotrādivṛtterevaṁ grahaṇe sāmarthyam avikalpakatvāditi nendriyavṛ- tteḥ sāmānyaṁ viśeṣo vā viṣayaḥ |
SA15n2992:1512: tathā hyuktam - sāmānyataḥ khalvapi pratyakṣaṁ cānavadhāritaṁ ceti |
SA15n2992:1513: saiva viśeṣya vaktavyeti yathārthā śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣamiti |
SA15n2992:1515: evaṁ hyucyamāne pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṁ cādoṣaṁ bhavatīha ca viśeṣaṇaṁ na (97)
SA15n2992:1517: atra kecidāhuḥ - yadyapi svārthālocanamātratvaṁ pratyakṣasya tathāpi naiva sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣayatvābhāvaḥ śabdāderanarthāntaratvāt sāmānya- viśeṣayoḥ sarvathaiva śabdāderindriyaviṣayatvāditi |
SA15n2992:1519: yac chabdavṛtti sāmānyam tadeva rūpādāvapi vartate |
SA15n2992:1520: yathā ca tac chabdādananyat evaṁ rūpāderapīti tasya śrotravṛttyā grahaṇe rūpāderapi grahaṇamanuṣajyate |
SA15n2992:1521: anekasmāc ca rūpāderananyatvāt sāmānyasyānekatvaṁ rūpādīnāṁ ca tata ekasmādana- nyatvādekatvamiti ||
SA15n2992:1523: yaduktam- evaṁ ceṣyamāṇa ityādi tasyāyaṁ parihāraḥ vikalpikatvān manovṛtteḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaviṣaya- tvāt |
SA15n2992:1525: pratyakṣaphalatvaṁ yadi manovṛtteḥ syāt syāt tathāvyapadeśaḥ |
SA15n2992:1529: tad darśayati- na cānyasyetyādi pratyakṣāt tatphalād vānyasya viṣayopacārahetvabhā- vāt ||
SA15n2992:1530: (98) atha vā kecidevaṁ vyācakṣate - ekasmāt pratyakṣāditi pratyakṣaśa- bdo'yaṁ prasiddhatvamupalakṣayati |
SA15n2992:1532: tena pratya- kṣāt pratyakṣaphalāc cānyasyāpi jñānasya viṣaye liṅge pratyakṣavyapade- śo bhaviṣyatīti |
SA15n2992:1534: evaṁ manyate- prasiddhatvaṁ hi pramāṇena syāt pratyakṣādinā |
SA15n2992:1535: tatra pratyakṣeṇa tāvat tan nopapadyate yathoktād vidhānāt |
SA15n2992:1537: yena hi liṅgena dhūmo'numīyate tatsādhanāyāparaṁ liṅgamanve- ṣyam |
SA15n2992:1541: kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣo bhavatīti bhāṣyavacanāc cāyuktametaditi ||
SA15n2992:1542: bhavatu nāma kathañcit pratyakṣavyapadeśa ityabhyupagamya doṣāntarābhi- dhitsayāha- idaṁ ca vaktavyamityādi |
SA15n2992:1543: svādeḥ sambandhinaḥ svatvādi- rūpeṇaiva vā grahaṇaṁ syād rūpāntareṇa vā |
SA15n2992:1544: yadi svatvādirūpeṇa sva- mityevaṁ gṛhyate evaṁ sati svāmisambandhitvāt svasya svāminamanta- reṇa svatvānupapatter niyataṁ svāmyapekṣatvāl liṅgadarśanāt pūrvameva svāmipratipattyā bhāvyam |
SA15n2992:1546: (99) tataś cottarakālaṁ sambandhasmaraṇamanarthakaṁ syāt svāminaḥ pūrvame- va siddhatvāc cheṣānupapatteḥ śeṣasiddheś cānumānatveneṣṭatvāt ||
SA15n2992:1549: yadyavinābhāvitvena liṅgagrahaṇa- m avinābhāvitvaṁ ca pratiyogyantarāpekṣameveti prāgeva liṅgagrahaṇāt sādhyapratītyā bhāvyam evaṁ ca sādhye pratiyogini siddhe sambandhasma- raṇānarthakyam |
SA15n2992:1552: anumeye sadbhāva iti vacanād dharmiṇi dhūmādeḥ sadbhāva- mātraṁ gṛhyate na tu sambandhitvam |
SA15n2992:1553: kadā tarhi tad gṛhyata ityāha- paścādityādi |
SA15n2992:1556: kāryakāraṇa- bhāve tu sambandhe yathā śāstre vibhajyate kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ tathaivāvyutpannatvamatra vivakṣitam na tu sarvatheti veditavyam |
SA15n2992:1557: śāstre hyekasyaiva vastunaḥ svarūpamavijahataḥ pariṇāmena kāryakāraṇabhāvo vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n2992:1558: ye'pi ca tathā kāryakāraṇabhāvasambandhaṁ na pratipadya- nte te'pi prakārāntareṇa taṁ pratipadyāvinābhāvitvamātropalambhā- danumeyaṁ niścinvanti ||
SA15n2992:1560: ekatve hi kārya- kāraṇayoridaṁ kāryamidaṁ kāraṇamityetadeva na syāt |
SA15n2992:1561: athāsti tayoḥ kaścit svabhāvātiśayaḥ yenaivaṁ bhavati bhedaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n2992:1562: sattvādiṣvapi hi bhedavyavasthāyāḥ svabhāvabheda eva nibandhanam |
SA15n2992:1563: satyapi kāryakāra- ṇatvena bhede traiguṇyajātyabhedādaikyamiti cet |
SA15n2992:1565: na ca nityasya krameṇa yogapadyena vā pariṇāmaḥ sambhavati tat kutas tannibandhanā kāryakāraṇavyavasthe- tyalaṁ prasaṅgena ||
SA15n2992:1566: syādetat - agṛhīte eva so'numitikāraṇamityāha - na cetyādi sugamam ||
SA15n2992:1570: evaṁ manyate - anumitikāla eva vā svatvena gṛhītaṁ liṅgaṁ pratiyoginaṁ gamayet prāg vā sambandhagrahaṇakāle tathā paricchinnaṁ sadanumānakāle'nyathāpyupalabhyamānamiti |
SA15n2992:1571: yadyanumāna- kāla idamasya svamityevaṁ niścitaṁ gamakamiṣyate atrokto doṣaḥ- (101)
SA15n2992:1575: svasvāminoḥ paryāyeṇa viparyaya- bhāvasambhavān na śakyamevamanumānaṁ kartum- idaṁ mayā tasya prāk svatvena gṛhītam |
SA15n2992:1576: tasmād yatredaṁ tatrāsya tena svāminā bhavitavyami- ti vināpi pārthivādinā cchatrādeḥ kevalasyāsvāmikasya ca darśana- sambhavāditi |
SA15n2992:1578: syādetat - na sarvaṁ svasvāmibhāvādinā sambaddhaṁ gamakam |
SA15n2992:1582: yadi yathokte sambandhe gṛhīte'pi liṅgasya punar vyabhicārya- vyabhicāritvamakṣyate tato'vinā bhāvitvamevānumitihetuḥ syā- t na svasvāmibhāvādayaḥ sambandhāḥ ||
SA15n2992:1584: sa tu yathokte sambandhe sati bhavati |
SA15n2992:1589: sa caikatra yathā dvitīye'pītyubhayatra gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt ||
SA15n2992:1591: ata evāha - na hi tau liṅgaliṅgināviti |
SA15n2992:1592: itare sambandhāḥ parābhi- prāyeṇa liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambhavanti |
SA15n2992:1594: ahinakulayor hi vadhyavadhakabhāvaḥ na ca tau liṅga- liṅgināviṣyete vyabhicārāt api tvahijayanakulaparājayau |
SA15n2992:1601: tadā katara iti saptasveko'pi na sambhava- tīti pṛcchati |
SA15n2992:1604: asti pradhānam bhedānāṁ darśanādityevaṁ vaktavya- m na tu bhedānāmanvayadarśanād iti ||
SA15n2992:1605: bhedā eva hi naimittikā iti utpādyatvāt |
SA15n2992:1608: anvayo'pi bhedānāmātmabhūtaḥ taddharmatvād dha- rmadharmiṇoś cānanyatvāt |
SA15n2992:1612: bhedātmabhūtatvādanvayādīnāṁ bhedā evaiko vītaḥ syā- t ||
SA15n2992:1613: na ca kaścidityādinā- ye bhedānāṁ nirvartakāḥ pradhānadharmāḥ te tadgamyāḥ ekatvādivat |
SA15n2992:1615: tathā ye pradhānena nirvartyā bhedadharmāḥ te tasya gamakāḥ anvayādivat |
SA15n2992:1616: ta- thā ca sattvavibhutvādaya iti svabhāvaprasaṅgadvayamāha ||
SA15n2992:1617: nanu yadyapi sarvathā nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ tathāpi tathā'niśca- yān na sarvathā gamyagamakatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n2992:1618: sāmānyataḥ khalvapi pratyakṣaṁ cānavadhāritaṁ cārthaṁ viśeṣadarśanād viśeṣeṇa pratipadyata ityādivaca- nāl liṅgajñānasya niścayātmakasyeṣṭatvādaniścitābhimatānāṁ ca liṅga- dharmāṇāmananyatvādanuttarametat ||
SA15n2992:1619: (104) syādetat- iṣyata eva tathā gamyagamakabhāva ityāha - bhedānā- mityādi |
SA15n2992:1620: yasmādanvayādaya eva śāstre hetutvena gṛhyante na tu sanmā- trādayaḥ pradhānasya cāstitvādaya eva sādhyatvena na tu niravayavatvā- dayaḥ tasmān nāyaṁ nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ pradhānāstitvādyadhi- gamahetuḥ ||
SA15n2992:1621: kathaṁ punaḥ pradhānasya niravayavatvam yāvatā sattvādayas tasyāva- yavāḥ santyeva |
SA15n2992:1625: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṁsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttyā ||
SA15n2992:1629: nanu nimittanaimittibhāvena so'pyākṣipta eva naimittikasya ni- mittāvinābhāvitvāt |
SA15n2992:1632: kabhāvena sambaddhaṁ liṅgaṁ gamakamicchatā nimittasyāpi gamakatvamaṅgīkṛ- tam tasyāpi tena sambandhāt |
SA15n2992:1633: sarvathā ca gamyagamakatvaṁ sarvathā ni- mittanaimittikabhāvādityatas tasyedamaniṣṭamāpadyate |
SA15n2992:1634: yadi punar ni- mittanaimittikabhāvena yasyāvinābhāvas tad gamakamityabhyupeyāt sarvathā ca nimittanaimittikabhāvo na syāt na kiñcidaniṣṭaṁ syāt ||
SA15n2992:1638: a- sambandhatvamiti paryudāso'yam anumeyādhigamahetoḥ sambandhasya yat sambandhatvam tasmādanyat sambandhatvamākhyātamityartho vedita- vyaḥ |
SA15n2992:1641: tatas taddvāreṇa liṅgaṁ prakāśayat svasambandhānurūpyāt kenacideva bhāgena prakāśaya- tīti yuktam |
SA15n2992:1642: tat kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāva ityāha - svasvā- myāditvamātreṇetyādi |
SA15n2992:1643: svadarśanād rājādau svāmitvākāreṇaiva pratī- tiḥ syāt na śrīharṣādiviśeṣarūpeṇa |
SA15n2992:1644: kuta ityāha- anyathā jñā- na ityādi |
SA15n2992:1645: yadi svasambandhānurūpyavyatirekeṇa grahaṇaśaktiriṣyate sa eva sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt ||
SA15n2992:1648: tato yadi sambandhānurūpyāt tenaiva tasyaiva prakāśanamiṣyate svā- mitvamātraṁ liṅgini gamayet |
SA15n2992:1649: kuta ityāha- na hītyādi samba- ndhanirapekṣasya pratyāyane'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ |
SA15n2992:1651: yadi svasambandhadvāraṁ muktvānyathākārā- ntareṇāpi svārthaṁ pratyāyayituṁ śaktiḥ syāt na tu svasambandhānu- rūpeṇeti yāvat |
SA15n2992:1656: tato na nimittanaimittikabhāva evaiko vyañjako vakta- vyaḥ |
SA15n2992:1663: (107) uktaṁ prāgiti vyarthaḥ so'pyanyato gaterityanenāyamarthaḥ prāgevoktaḥ |
SA15n2992:1665: yadyubhayor nimi- ttanaimittikayor gamakatvaṁ syāt yujyetaivaṁ vaktum |
SA15n2992:1666: na cobhayor gama- katvam api tu naimittikasyaiva |
SA15n2992:1671: yena pravṛttinimittena tatra nimittaśabdaḥ pravarta- te tan nimittatvam |
SA15n2992:1673: atrāpi sādhyasya yoṁ'śo gamyaḥ tan naimittikatvam |
SA15n2992:1674: ka- smāt punar naimittikatvaṁ na vyañjakamityāha - vyaṅgyatvāditi sā- dhyatvādityarthaḥ |
SA15n2992:1675: siddhasya hi gamakatvaṁ bhavati na sādhyasya |
SA15n2992:1676: tasmān nimittabhāva ityeva vaktavyam na tu nimittanaimittikabhāva iti ||
SA15n2992:1677: syādetat - naivaṁ vijñāyate - nimittanaimittikayor bhāvo nimitta- naimittikabhāva iti |
SA15n2992:1678: evaṁ hi vijñāyamāne naimittikagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt nimittabhāvasyaiva gamakatvāt |
SA15n2992:1679: kathaṁ tarhi nimittasya naimitti- kena bhāva iti |
SA15n2992:1682: mittamityabhidhānaṁ pratyayaś ceti kṛtvā nimittabhāva itīyatyucyamāne na jñāyate - kena saha nimittabhāvo'vinābhāvalakṣaṇa iti |
SA15n2992:1684: naitadasti nimittasya hi niyamena naimittikāpekṣatvādevamanucya- māne'pi pratiyogipratipattiriti naimittikagrahaṇaṁ niṣphalam |
SA15n2992:1691: sahacaribhāve ca sambandhe pradhānānva- yādīnāṁ naitac cheṣavad yujyate |
SA15n2992:1692: na hi sahacaribhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhā- vaḥ pṛthag nirdeśāt |
SA15n2992:1693: kiṁ ca dvayor hi vyavasthitayoḥ sahacaribhāvo bhavati cakravākavat |
SA15n2992:1694: na ca kāryakāraṇayor yogapadyaṁ samasti kārya- kāle kāraṇasya tirobhāvāt |
SA15n2992:1698: sa sahacaribhāve sambandhe na yujyata ityabhyupetaṁ hīyate |
SA15n2992:1702: tatra viśeṣadṛṣṭam yadāgnidhūmasambandhaṁ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva dhūmena tasyaivāgneḥ punaḥ punarastitvaṁ pratipadyate - sa evāyamagni- riti |
SA15n2992:1703: sāmānyato dṛṣṭam yat kvacid dhūmāgnisambandhaṁ dṛṣṭvottarakālaṁ dhūmamātradarśanādagnisāmānyānumānam |
SA15n2992:1704: etadapi sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanu- mānaṁ dvividham- pūrvavac cheṣavac ca |
SA15n2992:1705: tatra pūrvavat yadā kāraṇama- nyūnaṁ dṛṣṭvā bhaviṣyattvaṁ kāryasya pratipadyate |
SA15n2992:1706: tad yathā meghodayaṁ dṛṣṭvā bha- viṣyattvaṁ vṛṣṭeḥ |
SA15n2992:1707: śeṣavat yadā kāryanirvṛttiṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūtatvaṁ kāraṇasya pra- tipadyate |
SA15n2992:1708: tad yathā navavṛddhajalāṁ nadīṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūtatvaṁ meghasya |
SA15n2992:1709: tatra pūrva- vadanumānaṁ vyabhicāri śeṣavat savicāramavyabhicāri |
SA15n2992:1710: teṣāṁ yadeta- t sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānaṁ śeṣavat eṣa heturatīndriyāṇāṁ bhāvā- nāṁ samadhigama iti ||
